column4: Open phone stations for communication with the outside world. Stop by to say Hello!

The Krewe of Papa Legba will provide on-playa text messaging and LIMITED cellular service over parts of BRC.  If you are interested in "community telephony" (or just want to see what ahand-crafted cellular base station looks like) please stop by for a visit.

Welcome to the famous Sore Nipple Camp. We're back for our second year as a theme camp, and with your help last year we, and everyone who visited us last year had a blast. If you missed us come check us out. We have the nipple wheel O'Fun, prizes, and great company.

Barbie's Wine Bistro, adjacent to Barbie's Death Camp, will be serving up some of the finest cabernet, merlot, and zinfandel on the playa.  Now back for our ninth year quenching the thirst of BRC's wine snobs.  Look for us in Barbie Death Village and remember:  we welcome all wine for personal tests.

Preserved In Time is a camp that is within Barbie Death Village. This camp is where you seal what you want in a 3.oz. can, then create a label the tells you what is in your can, or you just open it in the future and have a surprise.

Barbie Death Village springs forth after absorbing Wheee!Ville and our mission is: Today the playa, tomorrow the world.  Come visit our camps: Barbie's Death Camp, Barbie's Wine Bistro, Eden, Preserved In Time, BRC Body & Paint, and Boosh Camp: Canadian Splinter Squad. You may never be able to leave.

The Playawaste Raider camp is an oasis and refuge from the happinessand organization of the surrounding tranquility of the Playa. Anisland of chaos and mayhem festooned with the grisly remains andeffects of those that have bored us.
Club Verboten returns for a very special 10th anniversary week.All of the favorite Verboten retro avant-garde dances will be offered to The Popular Masses at a convenient time and location.

The Church of Respect is a non denominational, non judgmental, pro inclusionist congregation of lovely souls wishing to spread the word of respect. Respect for oneself and for others. This year we celebrate with a commitment/marriage ceremony open to all and our Saskatini Cocktail Shaker night.

Fallout ShelterWelcome and Escape the elements in our 16x32   Military tent while listening to rock music and have a cooool drink, YES, with ice. We light up the night with sound chasing lights and other eye candy. Enjoy spirits mixed by Frank and Jose,They make a Mean Playa Passion.
Pro Leisure Tour , Home of the "Couch Potato Research Institute and Darwin Lounge". Classes per schedule , Drinks per order.

The True Mirror Palace returns to the Playa ready to blow your mind with mirrors that reflect you truly - no flipped images.  Evolve your self-image to the new version of you - the true version - and put down the strange alter-ego that has been created by the backwards mirror for your whole life.

The KKK evoLLLved:  The age of hate has ended and as a society we evolve beyond the Klu Klux Klan to become the Lively Loving Lot.  Come visit our Museum of the Tangled Bank ABC's and join us for happy hour haunts spreading the Lively Loving Lot's message of joy, peace & love & happiness!

Remember the joy of setting up a tent in the backyard and playing board games? Checkers, Monopoly, Life, Parcheesi... We celebrate the joy of play with just a little bit of competition. No gambling. A large Twister mat, cock-ring toss, and other over-sized games will make the adventure more Adult.

S'mores are not just a camping food, but a social experience. Come join us for S'mores every night at sundown then gather around the fire for campfire cheer and meeting new friends. Campfire singers and entertainers get a special surprise. Warning: marshmallows will get burned! S'mores 7-9 pm nightly

The Bush is back at Burning Man! This year we will going over-the-top with our jungle themed environment. We will continue to provide unique music and awesome community events. The de-evolution of the Playa begins, "The Jungle in the middle of Desert!"
Terminal City- Your Evolutionary Dead End.  No Gas, No Food, No Mercy. An interactive village of the themeiest theme camps in Black Rock City!  Day and night activities, theme nights, games and art.

Camp Natural Selection will judge the best of the playa and determine who is fit to evolve.  We will be giving out 100 awards daily, some silly, some sexy, to prove your potential gene pool dominance of Black Rock City.  Check us out around sunset.

Stop by or stake your habitation at this homage to the eclectic world of wonder.  We encourage the aerial arts of silks, tissu, cord de lisse in additon to juggling in all its wondrous forms.  We will have many tools for these off-circus arts on hand, including rigging, but please also bring some.

Flattery Camp returns to the neighborhood to unleash a contagion of flattery.Be flattered and/or join us in the fine art of flattery as the fabulouscitizens of Black Rock pass by. We aim for sincerity, originality, humor, andcomfort in the shade.
Stamp Camp is dedicated to create community and friendship while entertaining others with our array of rubber stamp body art.
Look down from above: Your image is displayed high above, projected on a large ballon tethered to the ground.

Anonymous Village is a mix of 12 step groups such as Alcoholics Anonymous, Narcotics Anonymous, Alanon, OA, GA and other 12 step groups that strive for sobriety, living clean and spiritual development. We provide an environment that promotes recovery from addictive maladies and having a great time.

Barbie Death Village emerges and Boosh Camp is there every step of the way.  Swing on by and meet our friends: Barbie's Death Camp, Barbie's Wine Bistro, Eden, Preserved In Time, and BRC Body and Paint.

Dedicated to saying goodbye to those that affected our lives so profoundly the Rue Morgue helps that process by teaching people to fold origami and placing the final art into our Playatech Goffins for their final destination "a temple burn". At night we dance macabre New Orleans style!

Free Photography Zone has been photographing the participants of Burning Man in a studio setting since 1996 providing each person photographed with a print to memoralize thier time at BM.  Additionally a gallery of previous years photographs are displayed and given away at the end of each years BM.

We are the Bman button camp that has been hosted since 2006 This camp is designed for everyone kids and adults We are friendly and welcoming Come on by and make a button We can make a button with a picture of you or a picture of your choice or just down right simply put let your imagination run wild.

KidsVille is THE place for children of all ages. We are a group of diverse families creating a unique space for play and other activities. Families with children 0-17 years of age are welcome to camp with us if they are pre-registered. Registration deadline is August 1st, 2009.

column3: Hokey Pokey Camp Man or Monkey
column4: Hokey Pokey Camp Man or Monkey   Dance The Hokey Pokey at noon daily-Friends of Bill W. meeting at 5 daily.  Largest Take One Leave One north of the south pole. This is 24 hour Camp.  Everyone welcome.

When the Full Moon shines upon Yosemite Falls, the Moonbow there, creates a special place of quiet reflection that represents America's great parks and Nature. We're campers and activists that will have quiet space, yoga, crystal singing bowls, a gay pride parade for todays evolving gay community.
FERN CAMP - full of Friendly E.R. Nurses, as well as many others who staff the REMSA Clinic tent. We are circled by aprons, hanging on the line. We don't know why.
A group of artists who explore and document the fine art of playing with fire.  We specialize in capturing that moment of glee that comes with lighting a burst of fire.

With all the excitement of a sideshow carnival.our performance stage will let everyone be a Star,providing interactive games to delight with all the thrills and spills for our bike friendly enthusiast !

Remember SPIN ART? We have created a four foot diameter, solar powered machine for you to create your own artwork and bring it home. We have core board canvas or take off your shirt and make a one-of-a-kind Burning Man Masterpiece. All are welcome daily from 3PM to 6PM.

Ringed by palm trees, our camp is a desert haven: a party bus and lounge surrounded by shade sails and colorful flags--plus stripper island, hammocks, live DJs, dance performances, & light sculpture. Come shake your booty in a refreshing environment!

Each evening movies will be presented in the Blue Oasis Theater.  Enjoy movieson a big screen under the stars with full stereo sound.  Our film collectionincludes big name feature films, cult movies and true art collectables.  Or,bring your own (DVD format only) and arrange for special shows.

DP Camp (yes, that's intentional) is designed to give adults a chance to relive their youth through games, activities and varieties of play.  Come visit our bar, clubhouse and playground.  Look for our events in the What/When/Where.

Do you feel like an outsider, a freak? Then come on down and star in our Freak Show! While you're here you may have a chance meeting with the world famous Dr Le Tawdry and you may be able to try the famous Dr. Le Tawdry snake oil.  You may even be the star in the Dr. Le Tawdry karaoke stage!
The Zookeeprz of Missoula Montana is a core group of friends and family representing heavy bass and party culture for the Zootown (Missoula MT) Massif.

A cool heathen oasis, we at Pan's Garden provide organic garden lessons, libations, and brilliantly painted canvases with bright LED lighting. Whether you need tips for wiring solar panels, suggestions on running drip systems & compost for your home gardens, or a drink in the shade -come visit us!
You've found the home of the Purple Palace art car and the Purple Parasites.

From Seattle, we are a small family of orphans with a lot to offer.Come join us for:"The RockStar Treatment" (haircut,facial,footscrub,icedtea,reiki,massage),Sinner Chair, where your playa sins are zapped awayAnd Ambient Live Music each evening.You will come away revived and energized!

Getting Married at BM???  Stop by Empress Rosa's self-service Wedding Palace.Rings, certificates, seating for 20-30, legal wedding services available with  prior planning.  Located within Terminal City.  Open 24/7  First Come, First Serve!
Its twilight and you know what that means. Time for a good show and nice spaghetti dinner. Swing by for open mic. After you've given us your best act of show and tell we'll wine and dine you.

Three simple three-sided wooden pyramids in a triangular orientation which will be built upon, interconnected, and decorated over the course of the week with lumber, found materials, and fabrics. This will essentially "evolove" over the week as people add onto it, going along with the main theme.
Specializing in free fittins' and chauvinist clown performance, the Cock 'n Waffle is a great place to stop by and give those legs a rest.

Spiritual journeys, readings, healings and dream interpretations are what you can experience when you visit our theme camp. Let's not forget about the sno-cones! Sno-Cones offered daily! Come cool off and be refreshed in spirit and body!

Kamp Kammaniwannalaya is a loose knit group of friends and family that enjoy and share the love of life and all it has to offer. We try our best to give back to the community all the joys we have recieved over the years.

Suspended Animation (formerly Suspense Camp) is back! Come experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage rides, workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties.

Spanky's is home to Spanky's Wine Bar, The Burning Band, Villains & Virgins, PVM (the Positive Vibe Movement) with their new Naughti-Bus, Hookah Homestead, Mystic, the Spank-O-Matic, the Orgasmatron, the Teeter Totter of Death, the Chairway to Heaven, the Centrifuge, Hello Camp, and MPR
Come visit the Cult of Levitating Plywood and see the amazing, levitating, second story of our dome.  We teach dome construction, green energy, solar cooking, and lock picking as well!
Greeters Camp

Greetings and WELCOME to our camp! It gives us great pleasure knowing all visitors receive the utmost hospitality and leave with a feeling of gratitude. We cordially invite you to attend our daily happy hour, followed by "Open Mic Nightly" let's entertain BRC together! Hometown: Reno, NV

The Tittyman Camp, come one come all.  I am building a City of Tittys, 2 by 2.  by day and a Titty Pirate at night.  Recieve a V.I.P. pass To the BURN for our art car/mutant vehicle , The Virmanator.  A 42 foot pirate ship.  Evolution every year we evolve at Burningman, evolve with us, The Tittyman

We put the ROCK in Black Rock City. Tune in for an eclectic array of music, mayhem and commentary. Theme camps, villages, and artists wishing to make radio announcements about events on the playa are welcome to stop in or contact us by email prior to the event. Celebrating our 10th year on the playa.

Come embrace the heat as the Playa's friendliest little slice of Hell returns for a 9th straight year!Enjoy the Tiki-themed nighttime view from our new outdoor Zombie Lounge, or join the cocktail party and socialize in the sheltered and reinvented Sinners Lounge!But Fear Not- Flaming Blue Phucks and the Wheel of Sins returns for a Thursday night engagement where our highly skilled staff will happily deliver both absolution AND encouragement with a firm hand!!Be sure to start your Sins at 7!
Come one, come all, with your mobile furniture to the Furniture Car Rally!Meet us Thursday afternoon at 2:00 for fun, games, prizes, and, of course, tosee tons of furniture on wheels.

_Smooth away the rough edges at Black Rock City Body & Paint. Have some cosmetic tomfoolery applied by a fake Doctor or a real nurse! Nestled within the confines of Barbie Death Village we cater to those in need of temporary tempra or day-glo. Most insurance accepted._

Stretch, crawl, drag your reanimated corpse to Camp of the Living Dead for gasps, screams, and horrors of the flesh.  We eat BrraAAayyynnNsS!  Dance, drink, and nibble at your fellow campers at Camp of the Living Dead.

Bioluminati has been illuminating the Playa for fourteen years with artinstallations,feasts, art quests, and now: PIMP YR BIKE; the bling-ificationstation where Black Rock Citizens upgrade their rides with that extraget-up-and-glow. Open Daily. Great for kids! And every evening, Micro Cinema!
We are a full service Pee Funnel Camp, dispensing Pee Funnels to ladies (orgentlemen) at any time of day or night!  Pee Funnels allow ladies to easilystand and pee or aim into a jug.

PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds for the past 10 years.We are a group of Polyamorists seeking to live our dreams, and this camp isone manifestation of that. Polyamory involves openness to multiple lovingrelatinships.Join us in a variety of events - Come in from the sun....take a load off yourfeet...
Come for the balloons, stay for the biscuits...
Cut Throat Bowling, Emerald City Croquet, Lady S's Boutique, THE SKY IS FALLING!  Welcome.
Home of the Burning Man Outreach Networks: Black Rock Arts Foundation, Regional Network, Burners without Borders, Black Rock Solar

The B(o)(o)by Bar, a social gathering place for new and returning burners alike, consists of two well-tanned domes that house the best damned bar on the playa. The B(o)(o)by Bar is a theatrically interactive place have a drink, meet new friends, laugh, and enjoy each day of life in BRC. Come see us!

The Liquid Latex Lounge is pleased to offer another year of memories. Latex body paint with designs from tame to outrageous. Open all week, we love to trade stories and ideas for paint. Bring a friend and we will show you how to transform them.

Are you fit enough to EVOLVE and climb through the slime?Can you survive the barbarian challenge obstacle course?           Heave the Stone of Testing over your head, then defeat our champion in boffer combat.Hurrah! You will be celebrated as a barbarian hero!

column3: Whisky and Dust @ Mile High Club
column4: Whisky and Dust is a theme camp at the 2009 Burning man event. This is the new evolutionary concept of the Mile High Club. The Concept is simple. Capitalize on what the Burning Man community desires more of (Yoga, Healing, and amazing hand Jobs). At the same time be challenging and creative to show the community something, anything, new and different. The Ladder might prove to be the hardest to accomplish.

If you have an interest in alternative energy, then welcome, you are invited to join our village of friendly folks . You will see and learn about solar panels, wind generators, solar ovens, solar showers, water cleaning, MANY MANY blinky lights, and people who can show YOU how to do it too.
CarboFuckiNation is back with a revolving evolutionary theme of RevoFuckinLution. Come drink a cold a beer and get down to some grooving music!

Contraptonists is a quiet place to pause in a chill space for all those needing a moments rest from the heat and have an afternoon Snowcone or possibly if the time is right a game of Naked Misting Twister  in our misted shade tent, no clothing nor spectators allowed. http://www.contraptionists.com

We are a bunch of punk technical artists from around the SouthWest, organized around the theme of our precious waste gas, CO2, only slightly ironically. We individually and collectively produce works of art, community organizing, cultural events, with a punk DIY, mutual aid aesthetic.

Sign the Oath of Secrecy, write in the Book of Confession, be purified by didjeridu and enter deep within the Lair of the Mystic Toad to open the mysterious God Box and reveal the secret contents within. The God Box has been providing equal opportunity mystical experience to BRC since 2003.

Community Closet and Chill Space. We have a colorful shady daytime oasis (complete with Reclinerator), for relaxing to lounge music and enjoying good company. Our daytime Community Closet rack is full of crazy sparkly shiny sexy items...and our motto is, "Take a piece, leave a hug!"
DMV- Department of Mutant Vehicles. Were Mutant Vehicles come for their Licenses.
Outpost23 - We demand rigidly defined areas of doubt and uncertainty! Oh yeah - and Psytrance Is Not Art!!
Impromptu sober Free meetings available when people are present.  Get proper sober Free therapy from the sober Free society.

Mystics are a medley of creative energy & talent.  Inspired by a sense of mystery & wonder, we perceive the consciousness of We Are All One.  Mystics encourage the enigmatic spirit to explore a deeper connection not only with this planet & all that exists within, but the realm of the entire universe.
The Treehouse is a tranquil dwelling atop a 20 foot tree growing from the barren playa. We offer a sunset wine bar and stunning views of Black Rock City around the clock. Come get high with us!
Lamplighters Village - Come help us light the city any or every night at 5pm.

Ice-9 is the ice sales operation located in the 9-o-clock plaza. Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per bag or, a 6 pack of crushed at the discounted price of $15. Hours are Monday through Sunday from 9 am to 6 pm. Closed on Labor Day (ice sales in Center Camp will be open until noon).

Arachnophobia is a dark cabaret filled with the dreamstuff of our people. The Gothic. The gamers. The misfits.  All are welcome to add their own notes to our dark, twisted and merry song! Expect nothing... find D&D gaming, Cult movies & Cookies, Boba tea, Anime, Goth music and other unusuals.

Ice Cubed is the ice sales operation located in the 3-o-clock plaza. Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per bag or, a 6 pack of crushed at the discounted price of $15. Hours are Monday through Sunday from 9 am to 6 pm. Closed on Labor Day (ice sales in Center Camp will be open until noon).

Green Tortoise = alternative travel entity. We operate the shuttle service to and from Empire and Gerlach and have a cool camp with shade, a chill area, and great folks from around the world. Come by if you have a bus problem, to check out our unique sleeper coaches or hop on board in San Francisco!

Arctica is the ice sales operation located in the Center Camp plaza. Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per bag or, a 6 pack of crushed at the discounted price of $15. Hours are Monday through Sunday from 9 am to 6 pm and Labor Day from 9am - noon (or when we sell out).

Black Rock City Recycle Camp wants your aluminum cans, all of them. Come on by 9am to 5pm Monday through Sunday with your cans and crush them with our state of the ART! can crushing machine and we will get them recycled and donate the proceeds to the Gerlach School for you. See you out in the dust!!!
Media Mecca is the point of contact for all professional media covering the event. In most cases media will have preregistered but some on-site registration is available.

The Black Rock Census has been collecting information about the population of Black Rock City since 2002. Information is gathered by asking participants to fill out an anonymous paper survey. The results of the Census are displayed the following year on the Census Wagon, and in each Afterburn report.
Bus Depot camp is exclusively for volunteers who work directly with the Bus Depot.  It is a working camp, and everyone shares the load.
Wet your whistle at the Spearmint Dino bar. None of that "barter for drinks" BS at our bar - this is a gift economy! We'll fill you so full of booze you'll have to ride home on our Dinocar.

We inspire, inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply the Green & Leave No Trace principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home.  Come, volunteer and participate in our daily yoga, talks or just grab a MOOP bag!

BMIR 94.5 FM is your all-purpose playa purveyor of sonic scintillations and audio oddities (aka desert radio at its finest). Featuring a mix of music, news, interviews, weather and traffic reports, and whatever YOU decide to bring, BMIR is a community resource for expression and exchange.
LocaL 33.333 Sound Camp. a sound system-free camp in HUSHville for Cafe Sound Lead technicians, JK Sound crew & other sound contractors who like being able to sleep at night.

We've got all the information services at one, easy-to-find, location. Oracles answer myriad questions. The Directory lists locations of camps & participants, events, and rideshare; it's also the place to send/receive messages. There's also Lost & Found, Volunteer Resources, and bulletin boards.
Camp Nambi

Art Car Camp is where "Daily Driver" licensed and insured full time art cars are displayed.  These are vehicles that work their magic back in the communties from where they hail from all year round.  Come see the collection and meet the artists!

Freedom Lounge offers a list of Organic Spiritual freedoms including Alignments, removal of personal heaviness, dream interpretation, a cup of English tea, the best coffee you will ever have and great "Craic" (Gaelic for conversation) relaxing and comforting.
This is the main medical clinic for the participants of Burning Man. It is located next to the Ranger Station in Center Camp, and is open 24 hours a day.
9:00 Medical Station
3:00 Medical Station

Welcome comrades and fools! We are bringing you the team of the globally acclaimed _Slava_s Snowshow_ and its' creator, Slava Polunin, president of the Academy.  We invite all the lovers of _life to the foolest_ to our theatre of ritual magic, pageantry, games & fantasy.

Come get your skate groove on at the Black Rock Roller Disco. We're open 24/7 and will be pumpin' up the jams with the old school funk and roller disco beat. This year DJ/s are linging up and the band, Soul Glow will be in the house.Take a ride on the Soul Train or stop at the Soul Man Bar.

Providing a soothing Northwest atmosphere to escape the mid-day heat, step through the Northwest Mist portal and transcend the heat of the day for a momentary refreshening. We are also the home of the ghost of The Lady Washington residing in the Redirection Connection Village

Ganesh_s Transmutation Station helps burners overcome obstacles to spiritual/consciousness evolution.  Daily 11:30-4:30 _Retreat from the Heat_ bar in a large, cool traditional desert tent from India.  Ganesh_s Playa Ball court offers interactive tennis, volleyball, badminton... day and night (glow).

Elk Lodge: Flora & Fauna is an all femaale reclamation of male-centric institutions- the evolution of the "old boy's club". All genders welcome to our feminist pub [expect adoration or heckling, depending on our mood].
Heaven's Ghetto, where working just good enough is a virtue.  Come enjoy the spiritual Teeter Totter of Death, let your inner tagger out on our Graffitti walls or chill our dome and smoke a hookah.
camp be seen. be safe be seen. get a glow stick to enhance your nocturnal illumination and become visible to others.

Come "Relax and Refresh" with Divas on the Playa. Spend some time in our R&R, and you'll EVOLVE into a Diva too! RELAX under ceiling fans, sip organic sun tea, get a massage - REFRESH with facial wipes, moisturizer, natural lotions & body sprays, sunscreen, Playafoot repair, and More!

Robotronia returns for its' 10th attempt as a "theme camp". Hotshot the Robot, Spectral Interactive Video Screens, d6 and Hug02 will be joined this year by The Mantis, Mr. Jellifish, and even a special performance from Zsu-Zsu. Show your (de)evolutionary skills while getting your photo with us in 09.

Feeling a little sinister, some hatred and despair?Adultery, debauchery, ya we_ve all been there.Incest, lust and greed, all the evils that we do,Soon to become the Portrait of Dorian,But is it Dorian, or is it you?Artists are invited to create the _Portraits of Dorian._
This is the on playa headquarters for Burning Man's art department. Welcome to all the artists that make Burning Man the wonderful art event it is!
bringing light to our animal nature and how we make it better
Providing cold lemonade to Dusty Humans
Warning, Do not visit the Tequila Shack. All trespassers will be shot with a TEQUILA SHOT Shooting daily from 4 to 5.PM Monday through Saturday.

Cool Aid Oasis does it again!  We're back with our "Magic Cool Aid" and ready to treat you!  We have ICE TREATS and COOL AID for everyone to enjoy.  Come chill with us, but beware; Watch for flying SNO-BALLS!!!
Funky town will have live dj sets and plenty of yard games.  We will be working with the robot heart crew to provide plenty of fun and drinks for all day and night.

Kozmik Dust was among the first steps of our evolutionary path, responsible for the sun as well as this life giving planet. In honor of Kozmik Dust come enjoy our iced sun tea of the day, cookies baked in solar ovens, or our random events such as dance lessons, meals or unforgettable shots!

Changing lives, one grilled cheese at a time.A favorite underground chillspace for those wanting a little warmth in the whey hours of the morning, the Black Rock Diner serves up grilled cheese, groovy music, and good vibrations, for our late night playa neighbors.  From 11pm until dawn.

Our sneakniess is something to be seen! Come by on Monday or Thursday afternoon for an afternoon libation in the shade and check out the debut of the Purple People Eater mutant vehicle while it is in playa-dock.

K-Svert 106.5 FM provides the good citizens of Black Rock City a voice, a venue, an outlet for creativity in the form of not only radio waves, but also a professional quality performance stage that is open to any and all who wish to share their talents with the masses. K-Svert is your spot on the radio dial to keep in touch with the happenings in our fair city. At night the stage comes alive with performance, shadow dancing, artistic visuals and spectacle. A feast for the eyes and ears! Located on the Esplanade, look for the 50 foot broadcast tower.

Black Rock City Airport at The Port of Entry Village is a FAA, Nevada DOT approved temporary Airport serving the aviators of the Burning Man community. The village includes theme camps, The Main Terminal and pilots with the gift of aviation flying in from around the world

Velvet Soulmine Saloon and Dance Hall is a cozy chill space where you can indulge in Southern hospitality mixed with Western resolve. This year the Soulmine has evolved and devolved, change is in the air. Vodka Party Friday not Saterday, freeky huh.

Monkey around the whole day long, its time to get bananas with MonkeyNutz!  Our Jungle Dome welcomes you to join us for beats....dance, laughter, drumming, coconut beverages, vine swinging, loin cloths....and a baseline.

HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is a grounded oasis providing nurturing healing services and education to the citizens of Black Rock City.  Stop by for some hands on work, take a class, or just absorb the serenity of our chill space.

The Den of Iniquity is a protected space for leather and goth participants interested in learning about and participating in select aspects of bondage and SM play. Guests are invited to come experience the deeply erotic, expressive and creative safe haven that is the Den.
Fresh, cold, crisp pickles and spicy Pickle-tinis served night and day, from your friends at Ye Olde Pickle Joint.

Step into our oasis in the desert our * Shadow Box * We make it easy for youto express your true selves in a comfortable, intimate area of mutual respectand expression.  Expressions will become a shadow play for others as the softinterior light projects your movements onthe outside of the tent.
Moonrise over the still waters of a high altitude lake in the Andes.  The smell of roasting potatoes.  Ah, Titicaca...

Brand-UR-Ass N More will stimulate your entire being, from your mind to your ass. Bare your butt at the hitchin post, get a painless brand. Reveal your soul to our Speedtherapist. Heal with Reiki touch and tibetan sound. Quench your thirst at the Memorial Martini Bar. Y'all come and play!

_ToneAge _ rEvolution is where weary souls find restoration in lucid beats, chill domes, radical veggieclusiveness and costumed cocktails (aye aye!): participate as we rendezvous, rejoin, rebuild, renew, reinvent, renovate. recreate, and relax._

The Burning Man Earth Project is a  group project aimed at acquiring, disseminating and documenting Burning Man eventinformation. Burning Man Earth will attempt to archive the event "in amber" employing a banquet of various geo-tagged media and information, from maps, photos and video, to exotics such as gigapan, gps tracks, 3d models, hi res aerial and even soundscapes. It can further be employed as a framework to a geo- referenced social network and participant planning tool.

Come get your tail feathers ruffled... Our Day party has evolved - 150 feet of slip-n-slide, bustling bar, DJ's, Ninja Classes, Spandastic Playaerobics and much more. At night the AubZamZam becomes both a lively and relaxing spot to sit, drink and enjoy. Just follow the ducky beacon.

Stilt craziness and live music.  The home-zone of Dookie Doodle (a BRC irreverent novelty band) and Mojo Green (Reno's funkajazzadelic quintet), along with stilters from Reno to the Bay Area.  Even more cliche' than last year!

Organic cider and other related activities from the wild woods of Northern California: the Raven flies, the great Elk bellows, and Apples hang from laden Trees.  Drink and make merry for the Fenris Wolf draws nigh!

Picasso Camp is back! We've got fresh paint, fresh canvasses, and fresh vibes for the playa. Always a participant's best friend, our camp provides Burners a place to express their ideas on two huge canvasses 24/7. Our FUBAR is stocked and ready to serve and our crew of eclectic DJs set the mood. Our chill domes provide the space to create and collaborate!
Playa Surfers are ready to shred the knar again this year as we bring our surfcrafts to the playa.Make sure to stop by Lifeguard Tower #33 so we can Hawaii-five-O ya!!

Welcome to the next step of natural selection!  Here you will find a plthora of activities with Martini Lunches, lollipop-alcoholic natural selections, carbon based libations, swimsuit parties with contests and conseling on the future and the past.  Stop in, say hi and explore your own evolution.

Back once again...  Rising from the ashes of the 2003 Boombox comes a new and larger beast: our Brass Tax Ghettoblaster full of MASSIVE sound, lighting, and a killer DJ lineup.  Bring your jump ropes, high-fives, D-cell batteries, and come kick it on our stoop!www.thebrasstax.com

Bat Country will be amok with apes and lizards this year, come devolve and revolve with us on Hunter S Tuesday. Join us for another savage journey filled with apes, lizards, vibrating hugs, epic rants, fear, love, loathing and damn good books. "Morality is temporary, wisdom is permanent."-HST

Do include in your journey thru BRC a stop at Vamp Camp lounge at night and the Mr. mister lounge during the day. You will be able to enjoy the cool down of the mister lounge and the bidet in the heat of the day and you can enjoy the Vamp Juice and the warm Vamp culdrun at night.

A Home Brewers Community where brewers of the Playa can meet and share. Hand crafted beer, mead soda and wine all celebrated cold in the shade. Bring your home brewed keg and we'll refrigerate, tap, give credit,discuss it and enjoy W/BRC. RSVP please. We are old school B.M. Open, community, low tech

The Unintelligent Design Society (UDS) dedicated to demystifying the wonder bread of life, stirring  the primordial soup and exposing the Warholian building blocks of creation in their most unintelligent form.To paraphrase Charles Darwin "We love fools experiments, we are always making them".

Abstininthe is the friendly bar on the playa,providing our special drink to the thirsty of BRC since the last millenium. Come try our many flavors and enjoy the music, ambience and conversation of our neighborhood bar

Bring your skateboards, put on your drinking caps, and of course, bring your appetite for destruction. VBC will wet your thirst for whiskey and Punk Rock with the usual romantic accomodations. After dark we are rated R so leave the kiddies back at camp. See you there.

SEX FILTH AVENUE was a great success. We gave away more than 1000+ Naughty sexy costumes. We need costume donations to make this happen again next year. Please send me a box of costumes. Please post any pics you have from SFA on the website below.

Dr. Carl's big board of stuff is imposing, daunting and a little bit sexy. Pick something from our big board, go out and find that something. Return to us, convince an official that you deserve a fantastic reward...collect a fantastic reward.

You say you want an evolution?  How about a cafe' that offers coffee, newspapers & conversation byday and morphs into a Beatles-oriented blacklight Octopus' Garden by night? Cafe' hosted by Lucy, in the Sky, with Diamonds. Location: Nowhere, man. Come together, right now! All you need is...coffee!

aa{cent}prA{umlaut}s-ski[ah-prey-skee,ap-rey,noun] The period of relaxation after skiing. A rich cultural heritage at ski resorts worldwide. We have now brought this magic to the playa. After a long day on the slopes come mingle with our snowmen, frolic with our skibunnies, enjoy a glacial beverage!

Follow wide forest paths to discover rock climbing challenges and bowers of curly willow where you can rest in shady hammocks.  In our tent you_ll find live music, frosty fruit smoothies, and a luxurious mister system by day, and by night we_ll slake your thirst with luscious libations while you dance to some funky freshness at our tree ring house party.

Photogartho is an interactive photography studio/gallery and chill spot where you can have your souvenir portrait taken of you in your playa finest whilst being served a refreshing drink by Miss Lemonada/Fresca.

Mystikal Misfits have been on a global journey, observing, identifying, collecting, cataloguing and experimenting with earthly specimens in order to unlock the mysteries of evolution. We are creating our own evolutionary designs to speed up progress. Our camp is our workshop and museum of our work.

Come play some carnival games! Come on by, win a prize. Gifts appreciated and will help prevent us from running out of prizes. Face and/or body painting may be provided. Tuesday through Saturday 3pm until 5pm.
A camp for the beer Lover! Many gallons of frosty homemade beer for everyone to enjoy. Come on by sit back and relax kick up your feet and enjoy a frosty cold one.

Pleasure Island is a haven for wayward boys and girls allowing them to act as they please without recrimination, turning to drink, cigars, gambling and lusty behavior as they gradually transform into jackasses.  Oldsters and youngsters are welcome at our Donkey Bar and Chat and Chill lounge

Our trash is truly treasure!! Swing dancers, horn players, guitarists, drummers, accordionists, and vintage decorations create a 'recycling' theme camp unlike any other. Dump yourself here to experience the delightful sights and sounds of a bygone era.  Free dance lessons and endless old-time music!
Come on in, sit under the mister,listen to some Zappa . Yeah..THAT kind of dirty love. Although it's not like we dislike the other kind or anything.

The Garden of Eden is the place where it all began.  The place where man and woman first tasted of the tree of the Knowledge of Good and Evil.  In the theme of Evolution this is where participants can come and have their photo taken framed by the backdrop of the Garden and tasting of the tree.
F.U.N. (Fucked Up Nutrition) Camp has been part of Martini Village for the past 8 years.  Come imbibe with alcohol or not.  Refresh, revive, and repeat _ bring your own cup!

Regroup and relax at the teahouse with Skinny and friends, a refuge from the unse, unse, unse, providing a  baby grand piano, space for performing, music, conversation, funk, art, copeira, and serving tea 24/7.  We are reliquarians.

Through the creative and concsious efforts of its members, FixxxationStationarrives on the Black Rock Playa.  Thriving on a common goal ofcommunityinteractivity:  Fixxxation Station provides BRC with an environmentthatstimulates the senses and soul.  Doing so through interactive art,music,yoga, massage, conversation and libations.
Beating the dead horse for yet another year!  Sitting in the desert at A Camp With No Name...with snow cones and chai.

The N-gon returns for 2009, evolving to breathe playa dust during the dry months of the year. The Playafish once more sets out to roam Black Rock City, while the camp continues to offer interactive games and activities suitable for all participants.

Yes, the Lazy Ass folks are back again! We will not let GWB's recession kick our lazy asses! We'll have some familiar LAFers and some virgins LAFers. So come by, hang out, and show us your lazy ass. You'll be glad you did and so will we (|)

In years past we've studied cultures - both foreign and familiar - as inspiration for theme camps such as Bollywood, Japanorama, La Dolce Vita, Sagrada and Home. This year, spurred by evolution, Dragon Debris will present a colorful effusion of illumination and texture, a Garden of DeLights.
Cantina Zipolite a place to get back to basics, Tequila drinking and smashing stuff.  Wrestling masks optional
Hardly Davidson Cafe.  Stop by and have your bike cut/welded and modified to chopper status.  Have a drink and watch some classic biker flicks on the big screen.

We play with fire, do tricks for treats, take pictures of just about everything, then laugh some more. Stop on by & visit our wild west saloon! Warm your tush by one of our giant burn barrels and stand in AWE of the Great Theresa the nitrous demon!

Lollipop Shot Camp! This camp has evolved and now is a result of Natural Selection. "Survival of the Fittest" is our theme. Our glow in the dark shot glass has "mutated" and Darwin would be proud.  Shot Party celebrating your "personal evolution" on Thursday 6-9pm. Evolution playa wear encouraged.

"Semuta" is mentioned several times in the Frank Herbert "Dune" novels, but never in much detail.  It is described as a drug addiction that requires both a specific drug ("semuta") and a specific type of music ("semuta music") to work. Without the music, the drug is apparently fairly useless, but the combination of the two produces "sustained, timeless ecstasy."

YARR! The techno pirates known as the Energy Riders would be pleased to bring whomp to the dance floor. Pirate bar with pirate grog? We will make it so! Shade and comfort to relax in? Come join us! We like music that makes you want to dance. Come and dance so our pirates don't get sad.

Nectar Village is about you. It is about what you need_ to survive, refuel, and revitalize. Mind, body and spirit are all served, and you_ll find the nectar you seek for any of them, in the camps at our oasis. Offerings continuously from 8am to 10pm.

At the Camp Unofficial Tourist Office we dispense advice and refreshment to wayward travelers. Our fully licensed guides are extremely knowledgeable and will help you get into the spirit of the festival. We apologize to all of those we miss-routed in 2008 and we hereby PROMISE to give more accurate directions in 2009 _ if not, have a FREE sno-cone on us!

The triumphant return of The MidNite Popcorn Palace! We're Back! Serving-up fresh hot popcorn to the people.The Popcorn Palace first appeared on the Playa in '99' as a mobile pushcart. In '2000' '2001' & '2004' we were a theme camp. This year we Evolve into a theme camp and mobile popcorn service.

APOKILIPTIKA Bringing doom to the playa since 2005.  Located within the village of Terminal City, APOKILIPTIKA offers a tongue in cheek neo-sovietski mercenary oasis in BRC.  Highly interactive, very visual.  APOKILIPTIKA- we end the world so you don't have to!
The Mind Shaft Society is a collaboration of artistic scientists. We go on an Expedition every winter, then recreate and present the findings at Burning Man every year.

PLAYA MAGIC featuring Close-up Magic of THOMAS of Carson Valley, Nevada.  He will be performing 3 shows daily in an air conditioned, dust free zone.  30 minute show in the day who and one 40 minute evening show. You may request his appearance at your venue upon inspection.  nonvpro@charter.net
Bees will once again be buzzing the Playa:  come get Buzzed at the Hive:  and meet us at the Man at 2 PM on Thursday to join the Swarm!!

Oasis 47 is a collective of 7 interactive camps including - Oasis 47 Pendant Making Station & EL Wire; the Deadly Muppets: Pirate Crawl, 40' Stupa for Prayers; Limulus Polyphemus: Horseshoe Art Car rides; ChainsawMargaritaGuys: frothy chainsaw margaritas,  Ninja Knead: Karen Burmese Massage Workshops

Hey fish-man! Khakis also seemed like a good idea to the troglodytes but this is the playa. Time to evolve! Let our sirens, satyrs and seamstresses soothe you with sinful fashions to excite your passions. We have the racks to put you back in the reproductive stack. Dance! Drink! Dress-The-Fuck-Up!

This is Planet Earth!  Looking for an alternative to techno/electronica?  Come kick it old school with the Black Rock city's 80's Dance Club.  New Wave, Synth, Goth, Industrial, One Hit Wonders.  We have it all, plus 300 of your favorite 80's videos in stereophonic wonder!
88 is inspired by urbanity, diversity and positive change. We're digitalist lovers of magic, wit and cool. Swing by for a chat, some tunes and a wiggle.

Source of all your playa safer sex needs: condoms, lube, gloves, and plastic wrap for dams.  All kits are free, not for sale, not for barter.  Look for Outpost Bags.  Also, Erotic Fetish Wear from Rubber Inner Tubes(See What When Where) & Women's Only Liquid Latex Body Painting (Fri 11:00am -3:40pm.

Were you picked lasted in gym class, first out in dodgeball, and rejected by all the girls? Are you having way to much fun on the playa? Come on down to Camp Disappointment and find out what we can't and won't do for you. Interactive pseudo performance art crap.

Ambassadors of everyone's favorite gateway meat, BWB invites you to let us pork you on the playa & then some. Drink at the Black Rock 31 Flavours Bar, groove as the Pork 'n' Beats crew lays down tasty beats, and from Bacon O'clock to Bacon Thirty we unite in our love for nature's true meaty wonder.

Camp Nose Fish returns in 2009 to present two new theme-related interactive projects: Tree of Life and Superhero Evolution.  We'll help you evolve into the superhero you are by helping you create your own costume, and at night you control a 15 foot tree of light with your fingers.

Balyx fashion consultants available Tue-Sat 10a-1p. We have clothes and accessories & a creative area to create your own special look. After you find what you've been missing, take a stroll down the crooked curve runway where u will end at our Ceremonial Arc of Youth.

Paradise Motel is a hotel "off Route 666"; kitchy 60's hotel off of a highway. We're adding a mutant animal zoo, which is a cheesy "roadside attraction" style exhibit of mutant animals, which are stuffed animals sewn together in truly unnatural ways. Sno-kones will be given out during the day.

New JerseyHEY go F%?& yourself!  Jersey's known for it's unique style of hospitality, and we welcome all travelers. Stop by, hang out in our pyramids, tell us a story - just don't ask us what exit we're from. Fuggeddaboutit!
Eubie Lemmings Dive Bar will be providing that perfect gift-cliff for your evolved self to jumpstart your burn. Also, don't forget your photo op as Eubie Lemming!

Reclaim your childhood! Reclaim your history! Come share stories or spin some anew in this interactive storytelling camp. Workshops include spontaneous story creation through vocal, visual and other expressive art forms. The only true story's the one on your tongue: the original evolutionary tale.
Visitors are invited to enter the geodesic dome and relax on wooden bench where boiling water produces steam and negative ions that fill the dome.

Join us in a journey to find your power animal; to recover that lost soul you left with your ex:  to clear the door to your great cosmic dance:  and we protect you from most everything:::: but yourself:

Here to serve for our 5th year, welcome to Mischief Camp! Mischief Camp is the only spot on the Esplanade to feature live video feeds from across the playa. Come look for yourself and see parts of the city you_ve never seen before.  Come play our shocking reaction & skill games. Out on the town looking for something to do? Bring your friends over to Mischief Bar.
The core of Nectar Village, and wild performances.

YOU ARE HERE! CAMP -- THE COSMIC CONTINUUM TAKES YOU FROM STARDUST TO PLAYA DUST! WE INVITE ALL BURNERS ON A PLAYFULLY STIMULATING ORGASMIC JOURNEY FROM OUR ORIGIN 13.6 BILLION YEARS AGO IN THE CATACLYSMIC EXPLOSION, THROUGH THE COSMIC SOUP, ENDING WITH A CLIMACTIC RE-ENTRY BACK TO THE PLAYA.
Are Mimosa's just for brunch? Hell NO!... We've got DJ's, a flowing Champagne and Juice bar, fire dancing, and freaks of fun just for your pleasure XOXOXO.

Providing service and delivery of your U.S. and playa mail, on and off playa. Trade post cards, stamps, performance art, socialization & integration, to receive your certified citizenship. Join us to, make post cards, work windows, and deliver the mail. There's no team in Fuck You so join the team.
Welcome to Kamp Suckie Fuckie! Home of the Garnish Fire conclave and the Suck and Fuck Saloon. And Ground Zero for the Search For Neptune. Drink Water... Suckie FUCKIEEEEEE!
Get a postcard made and mailed while you hang out in our fun and spanky camp!

Keeping close contact to the basic elements of the Playan environmentAn Ode to WindWe have wind caps, head wraps that keep that dust out. Stop by for a soothing vinegar foot soak and fresh squeezed lemonade. Forward thinking evolutionists, stop by to discuss educational philosophy. Swirly & Shade
Art, Music, Performance, and Bunnies!

Throughout our psyche, love is the one constant that bonds us together. ATTOL is a place to love and be loved. We're comprised of women and couples full of hugs, love, and  monkey business. Come join us in our Orgy Dome (a/c!) for unadulterated love, cause baby we've got lots to give! Oh, fire art too.
Winterland ~ An Evocative Grateful Dead Theme Camp

SNOWFLAKE VILLAGE, now in it's tenth year, encompasses people from the Midwest, Canada, and around the world. Take an exotic instant vacation, hook up at Playa Speed Dating, visit a movie theater, ride an art car, interact with 24/7 sculptures and games...all in one place!
Theme camp based on the Flintstones TV show. The featured attraction is a 32' diameter dome made to look like a house in Bedrock, with a fun interactive play space inside.

NEO@ROOT SOCIETY-Chapter 34:2009 - GI Syndrome (greed and irresponsibility) wiped out mankind except for a glowing group of survivors on the desert grid.  Drawn by the powerful BIG DOMES Force-NEO@ROOT SOCIETY promises truth in the future beats of our emerging civilization. Something large is looming!
Mutant Mo's Last Chance Saloon! The most dangerous bar in the universe. No one will look twice at that third arm here, partner. Hey, sometimes even a mutant wants to go where everyone knows its name.

Good day dirty dwellers! We will be washing hair in the desert again thisyear. Come visit us with your happy spirits, your smiling faces and your dirty hair and we'll do our best to make you feel like you're in heaven.  We'll see you Monday - Friday from around noon - 4 PM.
The premier blue-collar dive bar in all of Black Rock City, coupled with an open-mic stage where (almost) anything goes.

Abundant afternoon shade, comfy couches, chilly lemonade and iced tea, great music, dancing and fire spinning, figure drawing and other art events, and of course, our jumbo games: Rock Yer Balls and the Fling of Destiny! Also, Playa home of Spirit's Fire! Come evolve with us!! It is your Destiny!!

Castle Anomalous is a mutant vehicle that looks like a castle, has a large public roof deck, and has a private inner chamber for camp members.  Whether parked at our camp or traveling around the playa, the Castle Anomalous mutant vehicle is the core of our theme camp and our community interactiong

Ladies & Gentlemen, lads & lasses, aunts, uncles & other household pests...Have you experienced chafing of the inner thigh? Dryness of the wenis? Wish you could find true love? Well step on into the Playaneer Emporium & find lotions & potions, goops & elixirs to make your every playa dream come true
Dark, Sleazy, and Alcohol-Fueled.  We're still slinging bloody marys this year but not quite so goddamn early!
Come and sit down for some advice on anything that is concerning you in your life. Or take one of our workshops on practical advice giving.

"The Elders" are providing Brie, Bach, & Talk from 4:00 to 6:00 daily, except Wed. Join us for a snack of Brie, crackers, a glass of wine, some soothing music (not all Bach), and lot's of conversation.Any time the "front door" is open you're welcome to come in and sit, chat, draw, or just chill.
Come chillax and chat with the good peeps at Equilibrium.  Be sure to say hello to Michael.

column3: Black Rock City Welding And Repair
column4: Welding, repair, adjustment and general tinkering help.

Camp Stella is a camp of diverse queer and queer friendly folks who have agreed to experience Burning Man clean and sober for the duration of the event. Some of us are active in AA and other 12 step programs, others are not. We host 5 open AA meetings during the week. All are welcome to attend.
Bodymod offers temporary body modifications. Prosthetics, paint and panache for your body.  A new pair of horns? Relax in the shade, and transform.

An oasis in the desert, open while it's sunny out. CoolTown has a fully misted 400sq.ft. community shade structure to chill, rest, relax, and socialize or use our self service misting station.  We have body/hair rinsing mornings and afternoons. Snow cones occasionally served.

The Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe will be onsite with a variety of tools and supplies to help fix or build things that are broke or need to be built on the playa. We'll have hand tools, power tools, bike parts, fasteners, duck tape, etc. Open every day from the time we get up till sundown.

We live in a world of abundance and so we gratefully give thanks. The Universe is always conspiring in your favor. If you're not sure then come by, be cleared and become present to how beautiful you are and how awesome live is! Evolve yourself and your community through a grateful heart. Be Love!!!!!

Savor the flavors of San Francisco's Mission district out on the playa....Pretentious coffees interspersed with greasy gorditas, high octane sangria, Latin Beats and cheap Mexican beer. And don't miss our 5th Annual Sangria SoundClash Party on Thursday @ 4:20 for bottomless Sangria and Latin beats.

SurlyCamp - Home to the SurlyBird, the one and only bio-diesel art car with beats so good, they break your face. SurlyCamp is still home to a bunch of assholes, great beats, going big and bacon. Sorry about your face, whore!

The roadside cafe of rest, experience, and Light for your journey returns for year number 9.  We serve the road-weary our staples of Spiritual comfort with a side of dream interpretation and a dash of spice. Soak in the dome with a latte in hand as you process your encounter. Take time to transform.

Kimchi Camp 2009 - Now with more kimchi!Heard of kimchi? Kimchi is a korean dish similar to sauerkraut but better tasting and smelling. Its ingredients are varied but it is always fermented. Come visit us for a DIY guide to making your own and maybe sample some if you dare.

An undead shit-show with an predilection for beez. Come join in on the grotesque debauchery. Lurch by the Crypt during the undead hours to resurrect your passion for brainz, booze, and beez.  Warning: super sloppy fun times await you. (High-five!)

Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don't know what to go do next? Camp Tissue and a Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear plan and a clean tissue. 'Cause all you really need is a tissue and a plan...
Home of Sparky the Fire Truck and his crew.
Cuban Coffee in the morning and Mojito's in the afternoon
We Like to Drink, We Like to Drum

Samba Stilt Circus is a constant party of Samba, dancing and sending love and light into the world with our music! We are talented beings in the acts of percussion, booty shaking and sweet singing sounds! We also take our act high in the sky with sexy stilts and keep the Samba circus playing!

The mission of Entheon Village is to demonstrate a future in which sustainability, ecological responsibility, environmental stewardship, and meditative and mystical consciousness are a welcomed and integrated part of society, and where art, spirituality and creativity is central to that vision.
It_s alimentary, my dear Watson:a) seek out the red canoe,b) partake of our Primordial Soup du jour,c) burp,d) Evolve!
column5: within And then There_s only love...

column4: Transmorphagon A shape with as many sides as it currently has.An object that forces change. A catalyst for evolution. An incubator of enlightenment. A universal experiment, one million years in the making.It's back, at black rock, once again pushing humanity to another level.

Ever wonder what would happen if a large group of people merged their creativity to produce miraculous pieces of artwork.  Wonder no more, just stop by and see what comes into being.  Bring your creativity and become part of the process. (If you lack an imagination one may be provided for you)

Feel your mind blow as you manipulate the Seizuredome with its Magic Hamster Ball!  Drink tea with a mermaid in the Agnostic Science Reading Room! Shake it to live improvised electronic music and live mixed video from the usual mad scientists!  EVOLVE, DAMMIT, EVOLVE!

Serving cocktails by Intelligent Design, in honor of God's 7 days of creation with themed drinks. Join us every day from 2:00 to 4:00 pm for a delicious and drunken journey through Genesis. Come sit and relax in the shade, while enjoying such drinks as "Let there be Light" or "Land and Sea".

Boy? Girl? Ze? Unidentified? You decide. Come blend it up and explore gender while drinking smoothies. This theme camp is designed for gender blending newbies, long time gender benders, and those of us that just want to experiment. Enjoy safe space workshops, costumes, yoga, body sculpting, beverages, music & more!
Love your water, Love your body! At the AquaLove Water Bar, we are serving up all kinds of re-aligned water. Come to our AquaDome chill space to connect, hydrate, and re-align yourself.

Bringing Live Music back to the playa! Exciting daily events such as Playa Fashion Makeovers, Body Painting, and Snow Cones made in the shade.  Special events like the 2nd Annual Lake Lahontan Syncronized Swim Team Ice Hockey Game.  Visit "Tudes" our evolutionary artfish and discover your future!

Bonehead Beach Club is a place where you chill, come with a smile and leave with a story or come with a story and leave with a smile. But like any beach, we have an active side, trampoline, a game grid (life size checkers, orthello, tic-tac-toe) and at times a body spray.

At 15 years old Illumination Village is probably the oldest village on the playa! We are an active, driven community of dedicated artists, technologists and fans of fire. We stoke the flames, mixing fire and steel, keeping your body warm at night, and your eyes twinkling with the glow of combustion
We serve up a delicious, authentic Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience in the afternoons - Weds, Thurs, and Fri - the love is stirred right in!

Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression,and interaction with other beings. We invite the Burning Man community to visit our quiet, reflective quadruple Do-Me Dome for one of our healing fairs offering massage, readings, or relationship counseling.
Join the Darweenie Camp for a Weenie Roast on Tuesday & Thursday.  There will be food, fun & gaity to be had by all!

A serene oasis where you can float in the frequencies created by an intimate crew of sound healers, body workers, and movement therapists.  Whether you come for tea and yoga at sunrise or a didgeridoo treatment by dusk, a visit to our calm dome may be the most relaxing space you'll find at the Burn.

When the sun reaches its zenith and is beating down on the citizens of Black Rock City, head over to the coolest Bedouin Palace on the playa and relax with an ice cold martini while lounging on pillows and poufs. Peruse our book of true erotic stories and if the spirit moves you write one yourself.
Join the Gypsy Witches for our 10th year on the playa.  We have Salsa@Six and will be a meeting grounds for lesbians on the playa.  Check your What Where When for more info!

The Historical Preenactment Society welcomes all appreciators of science andthe mysteries  and wonders of past and future. Here Victorian-aged gentilesmay drink along side space robots, etc., and time travelers of any era arewelcome to relax and enjoy the moment.
Too much techno?  Not enough Fire?  Iron Rose answers with alternative musicand fire of our own for you to set by.  ...did someone say bluegrass?
The Wigs welcome you to our home, Monticello, an epicenter of unbridled debauchery, pseudo-aristocratic absurdism, unfathomable sexiness, and pantaloon-shaking madness.

Roll into the Midnight Ridazz camp for bike blessings from our Ordained Ministers, maintain your motive self sufficiency with mentored DIY bicycle repair, join us on organized cycle tours and stick around for some sexy, sexy bike talk.
Kick up your feet and recharge your adventurous spirit in our extra cool andshady oasis while enjoying henna art, chilled Moroccan mint tea, misting bottles, and Turkish tobacco.
Rave'Ns Nest a place for good music, fun and refreshment.

Viking Ski Camp, us lovely kids from Europe (mainly brits) are hosting a Nordic winter wonderland, we have a ski ramp, warm mulled wine in those cold dersert evenings and marauding Viking attitude! Up Helly AA!

Wish upon a Star! Come to Wishing Star Camp and make a Wish that will burnin the Temple to join the Stars in the heavens. Will you Wish forsomething for yourself? A friend? Money/Fame/Power?Health/Love/Knowledge/Peace? That special friend? A long hot shower? WeWish you positive intentions...

Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, Hot Dogs, Sacred G, Sacred L.O.V.E. Readings and Energy Healing Sessions. We also provide information about the Black Rock's early inhabitants/explorers/wanders, provided on a kiosk for all to enjoy!

The Tropical Crocodile evolved from a small family of Northwesterners who wanted to give back to the Burning Man Community. Our tasty beverages calm the mind while the misting tunnel is an oasis in the playa element. We promise a cool down with great people, just bring your own cup and pleasant attitude.

The Northwest is an ever-changing landscape of ever-changing beings. Where and how we originated we don't truly know, but we must move forward with nature's cycle. Come see how evolution has impacted wine, skin care, shade, and community from the land of rain in our space of old and new beginnings.
We are Burntown.  Expect the unexpected.

If it's Random or Unneccessary, you can find it here, from the Hatfeild/McCoy watergun battle, to really big drinks with really long straws, to domino necklace trading, to info/art on gods and belief of the past. Come by in/with something random and tell us what you would do for a Klondike bar!
We are highly evolved Canadians with our kids and we are here to light up the night.

A think tank of evolution psychic that can transcend your concious and lead you back to your animal roots.  Learn what animal you evolved from and let our resident artist take you on a journey back to your roots by transforming your outer soul into the inner soul you once were with body paints.
Earth Tribe is back on the playa and we've gone BRZRK.  Past Earth Tribe camp members and fellow burners please stop by, say hello and enjoy a break in our chill dome.
Black Rock French Maids.  We work very hard to remove the dust from all body parts, cracks and crevices!

We are what you always wished a playground would be.  Complete with a bar, Love Puddle Playground offers kick-ass punch, tether ball, four square, detention, dildo jousting contests, and best of all, hugs.  "The bar is open!"
Come for the mini-golf, stay for the good spirits, leave on one of our art cars!

Ahoy, we're The Pirates Of The Playa (infamous creators of the Mutant Vehicle, USS Nevada). We love to Gallavant across the playa spreading fun and adventure wherever we go! Visit us at Redirection Connection Village, the new hub/loading station for the Un-Official Public Transit System of BRC!

Come visit the now legendary Pope Lenny O The Playa and his loyal minions as they wreak their very special brand of havoc from the friendly confines of Lenny Camp, situated within Redirection Connection Village. We're the secret substance that holds it all together.....come see how!

The bears are back!  Find the clearing in the woods and devolve back to your primal selves as you communicate through a series of grunts and hugs.  The Bad Advice Booth is here for your mis-guidance and our wise, devolved words never fail to steer you in some sort of, uh, direction.  Rawrrrr!
Sakenoma, Black Rock's nearly famous Sake-Bar, invites you to visit them during the hottest part of the day for the coldest Sake on the Playa. Kanpai!

When the Stardust Casino was reduced to a pile of ashes, dust, and memories,witnesses swore they saw a glittering swirl of purple smoke driftingNorthwest. Pawn your jewelry and double down at the Stardust Lounge, wheredirty martinis and dirtier cocktail waitresses rekindle the spirit of oldVegas
Welcome to the Black Rock City Public Library!  Please stop by, pick up or donate a book, chat with our librarians, and stay for our story time hour at noon each day!
Relax with us as we take a starship ride into a furry, laser-lit future filled with love, danger and adventure!

Frogma is the little theme camp that could, where everyone is your friend and neighbor! Hop on over to our lily pads Monday through Thursday at 5:00pm for BRC's one and only Hoppy Hour. Serving up ice cold slushy Frogaritas in our dome sweet dome. You're guaranteed to make a rainbow of connections.

Chop Shop is a small Playa Neighborhood Garage that is ready to help all modes of playa transportation with parts,repair,and advice. While you visit our shop, you'll enjoy our special sarcasm about bad playa bicycles, the Shade Chill Spot, the Daily Chop Shop Specials and service with a smile.

The Republic of White Trashistan's Lamarckian laboratory is open for business. Come and see if being heckled and/or pampered affects your future offspring's temperament. Home of Indra's Net mobile chill space.

The non-Prophets DJs will be performing IDM, electro, industrial, psytrance, and downtempo dance sets while VJ Mad Doktor projects psychedelic visuals.  Join us at night as we spin staff, poi, and other LED toys in the comforting glow of the Pyramid of Light.

Camp Pendant has gone back to its roots by is spreading its wings. We'll still be hosting Boozy Bunko (we were Camp Boozy Bunko last year), but we have SO much more to offer! Life-size foosball, Evolution pendants, our annual Gifting Tree and the best conversation on the Playa. Come by and see us!

Returning again, bringing lots of requested Playa love back.  If you have a playa mood necklace, you already know us from the past 8 years! Come have a drink, dance, relax, whatever and enjoy what we're spinning and chill in our beautiful Moroccan bar and lounge. a

Dive into the Darwin Fish Tank;here you can drink the water, snack on some fish food and beat the heat with our cool misting system for a genuine underwater adventure. When you are ready to grow a pair (of legs that is!) climb out of the primordial ooze and move on to the next phase of your evolution
Get your very own custom tramp stamp (temporary tattoos only)!  Also expect random acts of levitation and laser light madness.
We are leopards of all ages.  Come join us for martinis that are as dry as the playa!  Serving Black Rock City since 1998.

Expand your inner vision while indulging your senses... a soothing treatment of refreshing eye drops, cucumber slices and a cooling facial gel-pack...followed by a meditative lavender-scented eye-pillow surrounded by the enchanting healing powers of the Dilated Peoples Eye Spa.
Exercise your PCs!  Can you peg the Kegel-O-Meter?  New this year: Kegel Pong Video Game!  Compete for valuable bragging rights!  Exchange a piece of jewelry or just stop by for some tea.

At the Interaction Cafe we do not serve food or drinks _ we serve interactions. Perhaps you'd like to start off with a casual conversation for an appetizer, engage in an interactive game for an entree and end with a song for dessert while you drink in the moment.

Inspiratum is the home of inspiration to build, create, or play.  Come play with the Crossbow Glowstick Shooters, marvel at the 46' signal tower, relax in the hammock beneath the palm trees or check out the numerous human and otherwise powered machines that live in the outer courtyard.

Camp I Am is home to the Panoramic Photo Wall (giant panoramic photos of Burning Mans from 1988 to 2006) which has been on the Esplanade since 2000, the Cubatron Cone (spectacular and dynamic light sculpture!), the Embassy Camp (live bands on stage!), Ma'aM the monstrous person-powered sculptural and various small art pieces (come and see!).
Camp Crazy Horse is dedicated to horseplay and great indian chiefs.  Home of Pyramix and the Crazy Horse Tipi Lodge.

Bringing the Gift of Fire to Humankind since the Dawn of Time! Comeexperience the fully immersive Tesseract Mirror Box (Lasers, Blinkiesand Pool Toys, oh my!), enjoy edifying Flow Temple workshops duringthe day and join us for nightly fire shows as we liberate the Spiritof Flame!
Experience the ridiculousness of motion activated tetriminos!

Get hooked-up with an Unofficial Playa Civil Union (includes certificate and rings!) in the Marriage Dome or get a Black Rock Temporary Divorce, good until Labor Day. Our DNA towers over us, test your strength. Use the Annoying Phone Booth and be sure to obey our four-way traffic signal.

Retreat from the heat and the dust inside Ocean's Serene Luxury Spa @ Stardust Lounge Casino. Pamper your skin with a rejuvenating seaweed facial mask, beautify your body with a unique temporary tattoo, or simply hang out for some nautical arts & crafts with our lovely mermaids and saucy sailors.

Mad Flava brings you big playa taste, from your tounge to your feet, through Jonny & the Ho's mobile noodle cart to the 3rd annual BRC 5k run(Thurs 8am Center camp), we_ll make the Atkins diet our bitch while satiating your need for speed.
the camp will be a comfy lounge and bar for people from everywhere to connect and mingle.
Hippocampus is a memory making machine in your brain and on the playa.  Stop by and see what memories you can make.

Our camp is Pink.  We make Pink stuff.  We decorate with Pink.  We wear Pink.  We like the color Pink.  We are the Department of Pink Works.  Participate in our Pink Parade, where you can "Show Pink."  Come on over and pose for a photo with Glenda the Good Pink Witch.  Look for the Pink camp.

The Gallavant Goddesses & their Lost Boys bring stability to the Playa by giving their fellow citizens BALLS. Located within Redirection Connection Village, sit in our inviting front yard while we supply you with a brightly colored tennis ball for your bicycle kickstand and lively conversation.

Come join your friends in an oasis.  We offer multiple colors of toenail & fingernail polish.  Come decorate yourself to your heart's content with body & face painting. Please sit in our shade, chill with some great people, & make a few new friends.

SMRL returns for it's 12th straight year on-playa as world leaders in beverage science and leisure technology.  We drink lots of hyperwhiskey, write the Spock Science Monitor (BRC's newspaper of record), hit people on the head with boards, and eat sandwiches.  Bring us sandwiches.

PettingZOO welcomes newcomers and only hopes to share the experiences of the playa all while offering an array of creative cocktails, ice-cold bubbling brew, imbibing beverages, and our classic and exclusive 'moon juice'.Daytime Only. 21 and Over. Gifts Accepted.

Formerly known as Get Lost, this year's temple builders want to keep their corner of the playa, kickass neighbors & view.  On the edge of the playa things move a little more slowly and it takes a long time to get there, but it's always worth the trip. We're STILL all here cause we're not all there.

Camp with us in your VW bus and evolve, devolve, this our 12th year on the Playa. Visit and ride BusZilla 2, our articulating VW bus based, Mothra fighting, electric/gas late Pleistocene people mover. Return for great hula hooping and beer. We are evolutionary proof that the slowest survive on love!
The BLD will be hosting Newt's Bar for the 16th year on the playa.

The BUDDHA BUNNY CAMP is a loose affiliation of artists, rockstars, and derelicts who this year are bringing a 20' Meditating Rabbit to playa.  We invite you to come to our camp to get *Bunnified* where we_ll have a variety of in bunny games, interactive mural painting, and bunny make-overs.

column3: Quixotes Presents The Man and Monkey Pub
column4: As Burning Man tips its hat to Darwin_s Ideas in 2009's them, so we embrace it and add a little European twist The Man and Monkey Pub!  Our gift to the desert is a Pub and open mic Cabaret Stage where you can come and realise your Cabaret fantasies,Join us  for a pint of beer and enjoy the show

Welcome to the 2nd year of Redirection Connection Village! Drop in for a ride on one of the many Mutant Vehicles docked at the new hub/loading station for the Un-Official Public Transit System of BRC and get Connected for Redirection to another location on the playa!

Boise and Denver burners come together for our 4th year to bring you Altitude Lounge as a place to enjoy an elevated view of Black Rock City.  Come and meet new friends from the top of our 30-foot tall tower.

Bored? Thirsty?  Need some shade? Come join the amusement of the Big Bang Lounge.  Join us for a martini lunch or an evening cocktail.  We provide the spirits, the fun and the atmosphere you provide the cup.  Check out the What, When, Where for more information and find us located at Martini Village.
PEX returns with that invisible vibe. We will be back with the stage, shade structure with daily yoga classes and Arche-Dream for Humankind.

column3: BLACK ROCK CITY DEPARTMENT OF MOBILITY
column4: At  BLACK ROCK CITY DEPARTMENT OF MOBILITY, we offer the gift ofmobility to fellow disabledBurners who might have difficulty traveling to the far reaches ofBlack Rock City.It is our goal to expand and enhance the opportunities for ourThemecamp guests to PARTICIPATE!

An eclectic mix of tasteful music delights your ears and shakes your booty as you enjoy one of our special, highly caffeinated cocktails. Try the Liquid Crack! You_ll be glad you did. And then go bounce on the trampoline! Or sample our games of skill and chance. Hey! I know! Have another drink! With bacon! You_re welcome.

DFT is back in Black Rock and says Howdy! Texans, Non-Texans, ex-pats, Texans that never lived here yet, those who_ve never been here but like beer, and everyone else, please stop by. We're in Gigsville again and I guess we_ll bring a flag or something. Come sit a spell_the pilloasis awaits....

The Philadelphia Experiment Village is a Community of Camps representing a broad range of international influences. We are uniting the Original PEX Camp with Putt Putt Playa (PPP), Camp Chillax (Los Angeles) The Museum of Unnatural History (NYC) and BBC Camp (U.K. L.A.)
EVILution ~ City of Fallen AngelsFriday Night EVIL-steria Festival: A Masked carnival, enjoy goblets of red wine, entertainment, Laughing & Dancing...Play Croquet threw our "Garden of Heathens"

Visit Black Rock Fun Jet, check your baggage at the door, and join us on a journey to one of our fabulous states of mind.  All exotic locations have direct flights from Black Rock City.  Black Rock Fun Jet Airlines is the only airline to fly during your Burn!

Every camp has a sparkle pony-brings 60 costumes - forgets H2O.  Sometimes you need a break!  Bring your sparkle pony to our corral 1-2pm daily. We'll stroke their ego & give them sustenance while your camp gets some peace & quiet. Sparkle ponies will be rehydrated, showered w/ compliments & ready to re-enter your camp.

What could be more lost in the desert than a Penguin? Only you aren't lost, you've just found the place you are looking for! Drop in and enjoy our shade, couches, wine, chocolate, friendly people and good times. Night and day there is always something or someone interesting at The Lost Penguin!

When deluded one is an ordinary being when enlightened one is called a Buddha. Every human being can manifest their ultimate potential and live a life of true happiness through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo.BuddhaCamp@theLotusDomeBringing True Buddhism to the playa since 2007!

In the welcoming shade of Pleasure Garden's Sunscreen Station, we will tempt playa denizens with cold lemonade and sunscreen application. Our goal is to provide the Burning Man community with a little slice of paradise devoted to relaxation and exploration of the pleasures of the senses.
n/a
What happens when a giant robot awakens from its slumber beneath the earth during a weeklong art festival featuring 50,000 humans? Answer: Its robot friends throw a huge party! :)

Feeling homesick? Not for this home, but the OTHER one - in the OTHER world? If so, then Camp Cul-de-Sac is the place to be. We are the remedy to your longing for the comforts and familiarity of the suburbs ... just a few radial arms away.

PPP is a fully interactive mini golf course for people of all ages, day or night. Stop by and play-a couple rounds... have a friendly competition with your camp mates... relax under our Club House shade structure, listen to chill music.

To accommodate the growing number of aliens choosing Earth as their permanent residence, XPAT ALIEN hopes to smooth the transition to Earth based partying. Come share a beverage and swap intergalactic tales with fellow XPATs at the Crop Circle Cantina... look for the blue and silver circus spaceship.

"What happens in Sin City stays in Sin City." Sin City is a place where freedom of expression is embraced. There are many things to see and do at Party Naked Tiki Bar, Playfully Yours, Club BamBam and much more. Come and check out our village schedule of happenings for planned events.

The Unnatural History Museum will provide refreshment to all comers.Harking back to the time of Darwin and the 'Origin of Species' we will provide a 'Victoriana' themed bar and lounge bringing to mind the high culture and impeccable hospitality of England in the 1860's.

BurnSecret takes your deepest darkest secrets and blends them into the finest tracks.  Contribute a secret in The Vault and our house DJ mixes it into techno beats.  Relax in the Listening Dome, drink frozen margaritas and hear your secrets along with others, all anonymously.

Since 2001, BRCAC has collected playa creatures, tagging them for research & easy recognition and using the latest techniques to allow these animals to be reintroduced to the playa. BRCAC also continues to celebrate interactivity with its own Tequila Pit Crew & its quest to find the "Winner" of BM.
Black Rose City is a Portland Based theme camp made up of an eclectic and colorful group artists and expressionists.  Black Rose City is home to Art Car, "Robo Bee Bumble Bus".

The Black Rock Travel Agency has been serving and supporting The Airport at Port of Entry Village since 1999. BRTA is one of the oldest theme camps that are still talking to one another. Est. in 1996 with 3 members, it has grown to over 50 travel agents. We'll help you get where you need to go!
We are a group of Mages dedicated to evolution and comfort.  To that end, our camp offers from snacks and breathing cloths to seminars on divination and meditation.

At bounce our goal is to make you want to move and groove to the beat and bounce of life. Bumping bouncing up and down, every night with my friends, Higher then you've ever been with our beats and your sure to win.

TripKnight and LawyersforBurners.com proudly announce their ensemble performance for Burning Man 2009: FreeStyle Palace: Evolution of the Black Rock City Allstars.  FreeStyle Palace 2009 will operate a sound stage featuring nightly hip hop shows with the Allstars from sunset to about 2:00 am nightly.

Gnome Camp is home to the Gnome Adoption Agency, where worthy parents receive an adorable garden gnome along with a disposable digital camera to record its adventures. Check out the gnome-capades on gnomecamp.com!
