Honi Soit is back on the playa to celebrate being banned from the Texas, Kansas, AND Arkansas school systems.  Our method of natural selection (cogitating cold can choices) truly demonstrates survival of the fittest!  Join the Order of the Garter for croquet, drinks, music, mist, and hat parties!

This year, we will be hosting various sunrise parties at our camp starting Wednesday, September 2nd. Look for our pink glow from our bus on the night of the burn. We will be hosting our annual Burning Man party Saturday night after the man burns.

Conexus Discovery is providing free, low-power rechargeable LED lighting to illuminate works of art on the open playa.  In addition, come visit our Jupiter dome for a breadth of cool air, a chance to listen to (or perform) in spoken word, and to enjoy the beautiful planet from inside and out.

column3: The Shallow End (of the gene pool)
column4: The Shallow End of the gene pool.Welcome to our "ool" notice there is no "P" in it, let's keep it that way!Every one knows someone from the shallow end.  Come hang out with us, the main event on Thursday at 4 p.m. to 7 p.m. will be a poolside swimsuit competition, with judges, dance, and flirtinis.

Camp Beaverton: Camp for Wayward Girls is a community for Gay & Queer Women, Lesbians, Bisexuals, Dykes, Sluts, Butches, Bois, Transfolk, Bi-curious and beyond. We intend to provide a kick-ass, inclusive queer oasis in Black Rock City for women and a continuing conversation exploring female and feminine queer sexuality.

Horny Camp: the fabulous interactive camp where you can make your own set of playa-horns.  We provide the clay, the gas oven, chill house beats, and shade in the mid day sun.  If you are already horny, that_s OK, we can help you with that too!Classes M-Th, 12PM-ish to 4PM-ish, unless we_re hangover in which case you never know_

Welcome to the camp THE WORLD COMPLETES, it is all the team of of the Frenchburners which will be happy to receive you pays to share unforgettable moments, activities will have the place for game of petanque, the chanted singing(song), the pastis and the same breakfast offered to the visitors...

Psychic Taxi provides transportation randomly. Our Random Service Taxis are pedal powered rickshaws that ferry travelers to Playa destinations chosen by our psychic drivers. Our Hammock pavilion offers shade and luxurious ease. The pedal powered, Psychic TaxiNomadic Cafe is a roving bar.
Come dance your ass off with the dancetronauts.... We have all the great stuff you need to Relax, Recharge, Or go crazy!
CEREAL THRILLERS CEREAL BAR! Enjoy a bowl of the cereals you loved as a child or our special playa cereal cocktails. Mornings, about 8 to noon.

Pink Mammoth is a not for profit house music and creative arts collectivebased in San Francisco. Pink Mammoth is above all a community, one thatnurtures, encourages, and supports its participants in being and in learningto express themselves.

Join us at Pi Camp for thoughtful conversation and engaging discussion of all things scientific.  Come to learn, to teach, to be intrigued and to be awed by SCIENCE.  Bringing pie to share is highly encouraged!
Camp Photon - A place for pro photographers, artists and models to meet and share their art.   Gallery space, projection area and camera cleaning clinic open to all.

The Sinister Minister will ask for confessions, give penances, offer communion, and may accept indulgences.  Only the creative and truly perverse will pass - others will need to seek their life on another path. The lucky few will see the Bearded Child Film Festival.  Camp will be operational Wed thru Fri from 2000 to 2200.  The Bearded Child Film Festival will be on Sat night starting after the burn.
Join us for a daily playa ride at 3PM! Come early to enjoy some booze and meet other bike enthusiasts.

Camp Narc 2009: Come and play at our highly interactive camp.  Ride on the World-Famous Traveling Titty Totter of Terror or take a chance on the "Take Ya to Med Tent" Trampoline.  Lounge at the B-Loves Brew Bar inside the Thunder Donuts.  Maybe you'll be on time to catch one of our live performance.

UBER TUBERS Presents: TUBERS 2.0! Did you know that cooking tubers spurred the evolution of human intelligence? Look it up! Join us in celebrating our ancestral roots w/ the ancient art of spud humping & by noshing on tubers of all flavors. Have a ride on the Mr. PotatoHeadMobile & shake to the beet!

Welcome to Arrakis, home of the spice!  Come to meet the Fremen natives and sample the precious spice Melange.  But beware of sandworms!  You must watch your step, they're attracted to rhythmic vibration.  Ask the Bene Tleilax wizard Irslov for a magic show.

At Genital Portrait Studio, highly trained photographers offer you the opportunity capture that special side of yourself in the privacy of our playa studio. Your session may include a number of props and positions, and you can walk away with your very own Genital ID card.

The smallest yet most expressive piece of facial hair. The classic disguise. The brother of the monocle. The cousin of the soul patch. The perfect accompaniment to the mystery of man. Signaling to the world that something is hidden but hinted. Concealed and yet revealed. Close your eyes and remember the magic of play and the power of possibility.

At Rubber Chicken Camp we delight in the celebration of the Rubber Chicken. The camp is made up of artists working on the playa art installations, Eighth Wonder and The Watch. Information about the art installations will be available and there will be a Rubber Chicken social event on Tuesday evening.

Our camp will have a small museum dedicated to the evolution of Boardgames. We will have shaded tables for playing the newest board game "Partyers of the Playa" with thanks to Mr. Teuber,and come by and see our art car decorated with circuit boards.

Deep Heaven: Evolutionary Love - We share our hearts with the Playa through a commitment to authenticity and honesty. Look for the heart beacon by night and the rotating heart mirror by day; seek out our hug zones, find solace and laughter in our sanctuary and attend a playshop in our dome.

This will be the second year for Kentucky Fried to liven the mornings with Bourbon, Moonshine and our delicious smoked, fried Baloney Sandwiches. We served over 2000 last year. What better way to start your day than getting Fried the KFC way! Starting 9 AM each day.

The Tiki Gods command you to lounge and drink, right in the "Yes! Have Some" camp. Sacrifice your sobriety to the Angry Tiki Gods during the sundown rituals each evening at the ever-evolving Tiki Lounge. Partake in a variety of Tiki-themed attractions, or just come by to hang with the have somes.

column3: PPR: The Prod Pump and Rest
column4: The Echo People return to run the Reflection (Wall-of-Lights) Dance Club & Bar at the "PPR." Come entertain us with your rhythmic dance moves, maybe we'll give you a special elixir or honor. Learn the secret word of the day, feel the Monolith _ have you evolved? Make contact at the 'Copy Cat' party.
Helping costume BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US! From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered.

"The Future is Better Together."  We want to create a more compassionate world by bringing fun & joy to the playa.  Enjoy wine and cheese, play drunken twister, or be gifted with one of life's simplest & purest of pleasures, Kissing!  http://current.com/items/77032162  playa_kissing_booth

24hour village dedicated to PLAY. Home to Glittercamp, the Glitterbox 24 hour bar and groove station, Cosmic Recess, Chai Lovecamp - and proudly welcoming CostCo soulmate trading outlet for 2009! Daily glittering by Glittercamp, find your soul mate at CostCo, Cosmic Recess playground

Cosmic Recess is a playground with a space theme.  We believe creativity, play and lightheartedness are neccesary components for happiness and joy!  All of our playground elements are original and homemade (most with recycled/reused materials).  Having fun and connecting with each other is our goal!!

Callahan_s CrossPlaya Saloon is the Burning Man Evolution of Spider Robinson's Cross-Time Saloon based upon Callahan's Law:  "Shared pain is lessened; shared joy, increased."  Callahan_s CrossPlaya Saloon will be open from 5:PM to 8:PM Tuesday thru Friday.  Join us in a Toast, Tale, Drink or Pun.
Empowering Transformations.

Yes Please is the answer to every question.  Come meet sexy, open-minded, international, friendly, dancing, writhing people.  And be sure to visit our infamous Non-Monogamy Advice Booth, occasionally staffed by real doctors!
Howdy all you Playa Goers!!! Join your old pal Waldo as he adventures through the wacky wonderland of Black Rock City.  The search is on! Have YOU found Waldo yet?

DOTA kites are flying art installations in the sky, inviting you to join our joyful wind worshiping ways! Bring a kite to our annual Thursday Kite Fly, wander in our Wind Garden, play on our Interactive Dome, relax in the shady Flailing Zone and try out your skills in the playa's only Batting Cage.

Direct from Montreal, Quebec, the Black Rock Poutine Company presents an amazing Quebec delicacy that has to be tasted to be believed.  We combine the awesome powers of french fries, gravy, and cheese curds into the ideal late night snack.  Come get some!

Black Light Art setting, KINO_DOME chill-out at night and "Russian BAR" at day, "Psybotik" parties of Techno/Minimal/Brakes/Full-On...our famous smoothie hour, workshops,lectures and most importantly our NYC-based vibrant international community!

Space Elevator, elevating from the trance communities in the San Francisco Bay Area, featuring psychedelic trance, progressive trance, electronic and chill-out music on a 20,000 watt sound system, with local and internationalDJs from all over the world bringing their best music to you on the playa.

_That Bloody Camp returns with its haven of morning-after repose. We will cut through the dust of the playa and the previous night's excesses with spicy bloody marys and even spicier servers.  And of course we will give you space to relax, connect and maybe even make a new friend._
Shadyvil is home to the infamous BRC Shadizens. Beware the Shady Swarm!

For the third year in a row The Lost Boys are back on the playa! This year we bring you the usual, and a NEW 30 foot teeter totter, as well as a sound system to get your feet movein, a flower garden oasis to help you beat the heat, and a grand piano.

We will serve stunningly delicious noodles with shiitake mushrooms every day at sundown. Come explore our surly attitudes and dangerous drinks. Fire our burn-off tower. Learn to sumo. View the whole city from our tower.

Mist and mayhem at its finest: ruled by Bob the inflatable dinosaur, Bob's Rainforest is a bunch of self-proclaimed jerks having a great time amusing themselves & their guests. By Bob's decree his minions mist people, throw dance parties, tiki-ify innocent passersby, & hold an event known as Porn:30.

Make your way to Pigmalions Camp, where each morning, opposable-hooved servers offer a daily dose of delicious bacon. Prepare to squeeel for your Bacon and Bloody Marys - served each day, 11ish in the morning.  PIGMALIONS:  Opposable Hooves Are In
Come one, come all! Body Art and T shirts! We are gifting away custom airbrushed T-shirts, made to order! they go fast every year so bring your own if you have it. You say it, we spray it.
Gigsville is supporting this year's theme of Devolution by devolving into whatever it is that Gigsville has devolved into.  Please plan accordingly.

We are the crew of the art installation "Steve The Robot H.E.Ai.D." and friends!  You will also find the Monolithiator with us, our mutant vehicle for accelerating you into the next level of evolution.

The World Evolution Discoasis is here to seek out the future of imbibing.  Futuristic interactive drinking games will play an integral part of the spring break carnival fun nestled away in our oasis.  What will coney island be like ten thousand years from now?

The cast & crew of "How to Survive the Apocalypse" will gather and be inspired.  This Fall, we launch Phase One of The Burning Roadshow -  a radically altered rock opera and Dionysian revival show that brings the Burn off the playa without the crusty snot.  Come learn how to plug in!

Ascension Tribe is a spiritual and sensually playful place for ritual, workshops and gatherings that connect body, mind, spirit and soul to new levels of freedom and ascension. We offer unique and popular transformational events focusing on the spiritual nature of growth, self discovery and oneness.

Welcome to Animalia where YOU are a Unique and Rare Species to be ADORED.Mingle and play with BRC's other registered exotic and marvolous creatures and consider a little musical, visual, and artistic cross pollination over a cup of "mutation punch".

RISA is just like the resort planet from Star Trek, renowned for its breezesand easy-going, uninhibited sexuality. Our main attraction at Risa this yearis the Peacock Shuttle. Look for Risa and the Shuttlewithin Redirection Connection Village!

A dungeonous experience, couples and singles experience the softer and more sensual side of BDSM play. Our camp is a play station well equipped, safe environment.  An outside 8ft. chain web (Charlott's Web)is available for play, provides a good photo opportunity, public and private play space.
Come play in our garden of mutations!

Are you listening?  E.A.R.volution camp welcomes you to *E*volve *A*nd *R*evolve with us on our lounge-able *E*volutionary *A*coustic *R*eceiver and to co-create two art pieces, one in paint and one with objects.  Our EAR Cleaning Station freshens you up while making you a better listener!
World renowned as the finest purveyors of Shrimp Tacos. I am requesting that you perform five jumping jacks for reading this.

Sometimes you have to hit Rock Bottom and begin again.  8 years ago Rock Bottom was one of 3 camps who formed The Deep End.  Though the Deep End is now playa legend, some AARP members will gather for a more intimate celebration of high spirits and deep grooves.  Stop in, bring a bottle, and dance.

NYC Container Camp is the New York container filled with all the love, joy,art and creativity shipped from the other side of the country! Come get yourgoods and sit awhile for our evening drinks while putting together your bikes and art and maybe even play mailbox baseball!

Camp Montage is a year round project of collecting digital images from Burning Man to create original works of 'montage' art.  At our Black Rock City art gallery we display over 20 large prints and numerous backlit montages, featuring art photographed on the playa from 2005-2008.
We chill and boogie out on inflatable things up like inner tubes, pool toys, and blow up dolls. In our pimped lounge area you can float on air, dance to a DJ, or read thought provoking books.

The Fandando Village welcomes the return of Funkcamp, the crew who brought the Church of Funk to us in 2002.  We'll have the live funk groove, as well as events like Bootie: Black Rock City and Backstage Pass!  And the Black Rock Broadcasting Corporation will be bringing it all to you live.
Ever wonder what the child in you is thinking/feeling/wanting? Play in a sandbox with little toys to find out more about your Self, or at least to think in symbols instead of words.

The Order of Disgruntled Octopi presents Octopia!, an interactive leisure space for discerning tastelessness. Kick back in the bar, express yourself at our 24-hour open-mike, or challenge your friends in pool, croquet, or bocce-ball.

A global, lo-key crew that rocks great sounds with ghetto tech beats and a street fab attitude. We're bringing awesome to the playa with BIG, clean sound, LED visuals, and new media art, featuring djs from NYC, SF, Hong Kong, London and more. Find us on the playa by following your Robot Heart.

Come join in the minty fun at DeMentha. You'll find great tunes from our DJ line-up, lovingly prepared fresh mojitos, aromatherapy, ample shade and plenty of cooling mist. Combined with a hearty welcome you've got the perfect recipe for a good time. 1-5pm daily. Dark Wednesday.

Live music experiments, cocktails and "do-it-yourself" chill garden are at your disposal.  Come by the Bhutanese dragon tent to get away from it all and enjoy an aesthetic experience both day and evening. Let us pamper you with footbaths, cocktails, and impromptu "appetizer happy hours".

OMCC is the Object Manipulation Concentration Camp where spinners and jugglers can be found all day and night honing their craft and teaching their skills.  Workshops every day and drop in lessons any time on poi, staff, hoop, balls, clubs, fans, you name it.

Camp Pagena is Place where all the evolution of the old and new worlds unite.A place where all people of colour creed and culture can come together as one in union and place their very own journey of evolution through our unique PANGEA map. A place where cultural diversity will touch all the senses.

Serving cold Tiki punch to BRC residents, aged 21+ only, in a cool relaxing clothing optional environment. You don_t have to remove your clothes to enjoy this nudist bar. Come by for event schedule then for happy hour, you may get _leid_, and party with us. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup.
The Hammock Hangout is a giant 12,000 square foot passive solar shade structure with dozens of hammocks and an all day karaoke lounge underneath.

Shipwreck tiki Lounge. An actual vintage wood sailboat beached upon the rocks of a          forbidden isle. Join the castaways for afternoon grog at their exotic tiki bar of hand     made idols, gods and flaming totems. Beware of cannibals!

Introspectacle camp is where you can imprint on the outside what has evolved on the inside. Play with your inner creatures! Art panels, paintings and dust imprints evolve or devolve, as you wish.Make new creatures with our magnetic heiroglyphic transfer imprinter.
Stalker Camp is dedicated to the principle that everyone who wants a stalker should have one. Follow our stalking rules and your consensual stalking experience will be super!

Burning Man can be pretty intense: the people, the music, the motion, the heat... our goal is to provide an escape from all of that. A shady, cozy nook on the playa where you can take a yoga class, meditate, or enjoy a peaceful breakfast.

Love Potion Camp welcomes you to a chill space full of art, creativity, whimsy, fun, family, positive vibes and Luurve. This is a non-sexual space but cuddling and BIG hugs are welcomed and encouraged.

Providing fun funky freaky fashion for citizens of Black Rock City since 1995. Open daily 11-4pmish. check the What When Where for our party schedule. Daily runway struts at 5pm. Awesome clothing donations gladly accepted.

Get a pair of balls! Golf balls that is...connected by a rope. Stop by and play a game of Nut Toss! Toss those nuts around our rack and score for points, prizes, and laughs. Celebrate your victory on our winner's podium.
a nexus for new mexico playafiles since 2003.

Calling all Smartypants, Fact Freaks, Triviaholics, and the men & women who love them: It_s Leopardy_s 3rd blockbuster year! Group Quiz & Quaff -- 2:00-3:00; Leopardy! Game-- 3:00-4:00, Wednesday-Saturday. Wear puss print and bring the most underutilized organ at BRC -- your BRAIN!
Meanderthals- "Survival of the Fittest, caveman style".  Come battle it out physically with the "Caveman Joust" or mentally with "Giant Jang-off", and find out if you have what it takes to evolve.

Cartoon Commune is back with its playa publications. Come learn the basics of cartooning or practice your skills. We'll be hosting a 2-hour workshop, or just come by for a personal training session. We'll also be hosting a session of "longevity stick", an exercise form; BYO stick as tall as you are.

Get your melon and bug fix at Spider Melon Camp. See the playa through the eyes of an arthropod, our segmented-bodied, exoskeletoned friends, and learn more about these pinnacles of evolution. After your Metamorphosis, dig your mandibles into some fresh, juicy watermelon, gifted everyday from 11-2.
We're coming to devastate you.  That's all.Pure trash...ALL THE TIME!

Prophets convert heretics to Kreationism, a belief that Burning Man has never happened before. Inside the Temple Konfessional believers confess their sins and are baptized by a Holy Bucket of The Immaculate. The newly annoited are invited to drink the Blood of The Man at our Bar of Resplendent Truth.
Hangover or not, the sun is up and so are you. Come over to enjoy coffee and conversation in the morning, meet The Walking Beast and come back to enjoy the shade all day!

Math Camp, a safe place for Mathematics. A small, social camp, we offer a place to drink and derive! Home of the Fabulous Electric Cupcakes. Purveyors of crunchy snacks. The Best Friday Morning Sunrise Cocktail Party on the Playa.

Overmind. A place to remember your hidden past and prepare for your journey into the future of human consciousness. Come during the day and we'll "space out" your costume for your voyage through the cosmos. Come at night we'll be telling danceable audio-visual stories about origins and destinations.

The Free Movement Zone is bringing something extra to the Playa this year. Something you've never seen before! Forget everything you know about dance. Forget everything you know about poles. Operation Polegasm will change you ForEver! So come on over, grab a Pole, and have a Gasm!

Graceful grazing lands for a modest myriad of mootopians and whomever might meander by, we nestle next to blazing daytime beats and roam in search of nighttime feats, always eager to wander into the great moo yonder and discover delicious adventures for all.
Welcome to Camp Bedrock  "first with fire"Camp Bedrock is the home of the Flintstones here at Black RockPlease come in and take your picture with our Fred, Wilma, Barney & Betty

Spank the Monkey's Darwin Lounge. The natural selection for fun and enlightenment.  A Victorian themed lounge bar full of velvet floor pillows, crystal chandeliers and monkeys!  Stop by for a cold slush drink and lounging around with friends.

Volcanic eruptions start with worship.  Please come and help us worship by sacrificing yourself on/in our shadow dancing/pole dancing Volacno.  "Burning MILF's" are especially prized in our spiritual work.

PUREPLAYA is a place were we except what is, while realizing anything is possible!  It is a place of creativity, transformation, and sharing.  We offer a 'pure' platform to the playa where anything can happen!  Come participate in this experiment with us!   Confused?  Great, hope to see you soon!

In 2009's Darwinian spirit, True Prophet is reborn as The Phage, an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth's living diversity. These ubiquitous viral lifeforms evolve faster than any other life on earth. TP scientists will evolve your minds with workshops and dancing.
Moonrise over the still waters of a high altitude lake in the Sierras.  The smell of roasting pine nuts.  Ah, Tahoe...

Dover School BoardDrawing the connection between our dark past and our enlightened future.Join us in having fun creating a time lapse drawing.We will provide all the tools you provide your imagination.

The PlayaGon is an infinite-dimensional hyper-inclusive object containing futurists, scientists, artists, 'free-range synergists', and more.  In this object you'll find minds looking forward, listening inward, and reaching out.  Join us for mind expanding memes, rigorous debate, and good margaritas.

This camp is like talking to your mom, only with more laughs and less guilt. Join these smart, sassy apron-wearing moms for some lemonade and cookies and chat about love, life and bucket lists.  Take home a self-decorated ''bucket-list-on-a-bag" or help with our "Evolution of the Bra'' art project.

SHIFT Camp is large, friendly, and devoted to evolving consciousness and having fun. We have a hot bar, talks, performances, comedy, and a cool dome for dancing. Presenters this year include Annie Harrison; Daniel Pinchbeck; Lorenzo Hagerty; Carolyn Garcia; and Amanda Feilding, Countess of Wemyss

They came from Sea to Land, from the Uncharted Depths of Lake Lahotan, to the open Playa just to serve you frosty cold beverages! The Mudskippers will be serving primordial beverages and Fortune Readings at the Mudskipper Cafe, and at Camp Celestial Bodies Bar!
an ongoing camp mostly, but not wholly, consisting of artists and contributors from taos new mexico

Black Rock Yearbook !Recording your memories so you don't have toDrink with students,get spanked by a teacher in detention and be let out by having your picture taken for the yearbook.We want pictures of your art and the makers. contact us to schedule, we come 2 u

The purpose of Sukkat Shalom is to gather disparate sparks of the Divine contained in all persons, and to create a space of intersection, interconnection, and exchange between all religions and cultures present on the playa.

Squid Row: demented denizens of the deep. Enjoy the Tentacular Spectacular & spin The Wheel of Creationism. The Squid Row Sideshow bar mixes mutant cocktails by day as we play the cosmic game of Bio Bocce. In night's chill,the Sideshow glows: warm cookies with milk & at least eight arms to hold you!

For the 5th year Brain Freeze/Got Stickers Camp will be there with frozen margaritas, stickers and our electric chair for those that need to charge their batteries. This year we will have some fire art to warm and entertain our guests in the evening. We hope to see you there.
For all your bloodshot late-night cravings. . .

Come to Playa Go Round at 2:30 & Esplanade. With every rotation you spin into your Dreams & your future flashes before you while beats fill the ether. We are always open and you are always welcome! DJs from Denver, Seattle,& Reno www.PlayaGoRound.com. PGR presents The Rock Opera www.TheRockOpera.net

At the Relaxomatic Plushitorium, you will find a madcap roller coaster ride of tranquility and repose -- If it's soft, squishy, and fun to sit on, you'll probably find it here. Additionally register here to send your grilled Cheese-o-grams to your friends and enemies.

An urban oasis with NY based Kostume Kult and Squid Row with PRED from East Davis, CA.  Daytime kostume dome transformations with interactive art, absurdity and activities on both the Esplanade and Avenue A. See camp listings for more...

In NYrvana Village, visit our Mutation Station kostume dome.  Transformations by day, absurdity around the clock. Video, performances & evolutionary art. Costume recycling with your help (on playa or email us.).  Costuming the naked since 2001...

Come down to our level to beat the heat of the day & to dance the night away. Enjoy Ice Tea & Sangria at our bar, add your touch to community art project "Hey Baby, What's your Sign?" and enjoy rockin_ DJ's, bands, & performers. At nightfall scenes from BRC will be projected high above camp.

"To Serve and Project" Bad Idea Theater returns to bring you refreshment of the mind and body. Come see the next evolution of our expanded lounge andtheater complex, providing you the best in Psychotronic entertainment. What'sPsychotronic, you ask? Look here http://www.badideatheater.com/movie_faq,

The Lava Lounge is a volcanic experience with lava, magma, and eruptions. Relax at the bar with a sip of volcanic punch, dance under the melting lava, be seduced by the erupitve forces of Mt. Luscious, or just enjoy the shade the shadow of the volcano casts by day.

On the playa since 2001. Our art car, the Floating Palace of Pleasure has been bumpin_ funky beats on the Playa since 2002.  Relax to down tempo chill grooves in the afternoon before an evening on our art-car. We_re an eclectic collection of individuals committed to spreading peace, love, and dance on the Playa as well as in our everyday lives.

Hushville, an aural oasis in chaotic BRC, is open to any camper who pre-registers and can abide our three simple rules: 1) No generators; 2) no amplified sound; and 3) Leave No Trace. We are host to large, solo, theme, and non-theme camps, and residents from all parts of the US, Canada, and Europe.

Tabula Rasa returns and resurrects her Playaterium (to enclose a gifting contraption) from the Vault to Heaven, legendary jewelry making big top, and popos galore.  Come, celebrate and EVOLVE in our seasoned chill spaces whilst creating art with our craftilicious array of supplies-Kids welcome!

For 8 years, the Astropups have been known for providing a cool and furry oasis on the playa where countless queers have crossed paths and met new friends. The Astropups camp has always been a hub of daytime and nighttime activity, our events are always a good time for all.
CAMP DELICIOSO & CREPERIE - Wake up each morning to freshly made sweet & savory French crepes, served from 9am-noon each day (Tues - Sat)

Medusa is an open, fun and creative space dedicated to everything Jellyfish... Join us as we celebrate the creature that found its evolutionary groove over 650 million years ago. Activities taking place in our pulsating "Jellie Bloom Dome" include the Ms. Medusa Pageant, afternoon tea dances & more.

In 1003, Leif Erikson founded Vinland, the first European settlement in North America.  Though it no longer stands, its descendants live on.  Join us at Vinland nightly for mead, fire, story, and song.

As a salute to the forces that brought us into this world, we bring you The Temple of the Hand. To honor our dexterous appendages, the temple of the hand will host the Museum of Opposable Thumbs, an interactive display that requires the temporary removal of the participants thumbs.

Stop by EvoLOTION day or night for a self-serve helping of moisturizers and other creams. Sunscreen for the days. Heating lotion for the nights. Aloe for burns.And show up for our special events of full-service lotion application.Do you have some spare lotions? Email us or donate on the playa!

Astronomers & rocket roadies invite you to stroke & ride our nose-cone. It's been to space & back. Really.   Lounge in mega-hammocks & discuss the content & evolution of the Universe. Enjoy mid-day Sangria coolers at Dr.Stu & Nurse Jane's Mammogram stand. Tiktaalik the walking fish car welcomes you.
Become One With the Eternal Meow at Camp Cats!Cats!Cats!  Join us for cream at The Scratching Post bar, cat karaoke, and other purr-inducing activities.
Believe the unbelievable! Explore the unexplored! View fantastic alternative lifeforms in relative safety! Bring a cup.The Museum of Unnatural History. Mutate now, avoid the rush.

Camp Upsie Dasium is an international venture whose purpose is to bring more citizens together in our beloved City. Come share your favorite flick, escape the sun and enjoy a drink in our large shade structure, view the City from our tower.

The kids of the city bring you a place to explore the limits of your imagination, collaborate with others, create, and play. Through performance, workshops, parties, games, and general shenanigans we ask, _What role can the arts play in our ongoing evolution?_ Come by and play!

Come over and visit us from sunrise until our pots run dry.  We will share hotcoffee and all the fixings with you to greet the new day or finally send youoff to bed! Use of personal cups is greatly appreciated.
1)Ka Pilina is the Hawaii Regional Camp. Come here if you're a Hawaii Burner,or want to know Hawaii Burners! Potluck luau on Friday.

LE KAFE welcomes you during day light for a cup of fair trade, organic and carbon neutral ethipian coffee or south african tea. Come chill-out, enjoy yoga classes, board games, petanque competitions, and much more...!
We run the famous Playa Speed dating every night at dusk.... four guys, four girls, eitht minutes, one intense time! Alternative lifestyle versions too.
Zenbobway. Stop.  Open your eyes.  Stop.  Open your mind.  Stop.  Think.  Stop thinking.  Enjoy.

Chess Kamp is Back:Challenge your chess skills in a symbolic battle of ideological opposites, using figurative chess pieces on a 4_x4_ chess board. Play the ultimate game of chess, pitting images of Evolutionary and sociological hope (Science, free thinking) against superstitious Creationism!

The Playa Jazz Cafe is back for it_s 5th year a with live nightly jazz performances and our signature Irish coffee. The Jazz Cafe is a musical sanctuary for the weary playa traveler lost in a sea of electronica. Musicians are encouraged to bring their instruments and help spread the magic of jazz!

Miracle Fruit Camp brings a "taste-full" element to BRC. Think cold, fruity, refreshing sweetness falling from the sky and into your mouth during the hottest part of the day while being fanned, spritz_d and told how wonderful you are by pleasant pranksters wearing Carmen Miranda hats.
Astral Lounge is a large, comfortable chill space with a small, intimate vibe. We provide a cool, shaded oasis of calm during the hottest part of the day, and a mellow, relaxed vibe all night long.

After focusing on integrated theme camps for many years, Moonrock has decided to expand its field of vision and bring the playa a spectrum of smaller wonderful units: an interactive and multifunctional art vehicle, community workshops, bad ideas, and a fierce dedication to heckling and shenanigans.

Atlantis is in crisis:  A black cloud hovers over the playa.  Sea life, jellyfish and lobsters, cling to the apocalyptic rain.  Down below, our art car ferries the Atlantean elite back to their homes in the stars.  A monster emerges from the depths.

aMonkey'srEvolution. Does what seems to have changed only a rePresentation of the familiar?  Is the mud on the stone rolling down the hill changing the course of the universe or only a reassignment of location for a continued oeuvre? No matter how far the poo gets flung is anything really different for the monkey?  Jub Jub, one of your favoritely familiar of monkeys wonders perhaps that the more things change the more they stay the same.

This is a 40' pendulum swing with the ability to free your mind and heart and return you to a time when your life was much simpler. Remember jumping on a swing and pushing the limits of the swing, it was as if you were flying, free from all your worries. This swing is sure to deliver.
At Camp Insex, we love all things spineless with exoskeletons.  Come share poems, tattoos and interpretive dance that involves arthropods.
The Mansonian Institute explores the questions: Was The Man created or did he evolve over the years?  How does he get to the Playa?

Oobleck invites you to challenge your senses! Play with oobleck, a non-Newtonian fluid made from corn starch and water - it drips down your arm but won't splash when punched. Oobleck hangs with Tasty Noodles, a fabulous desert party crew packing a bar, amplified sound and misters.

Camp hookup is composed of an eclectic crew.Our playa mission is to hook you up with your needs to make your playa experience enjoyable.  Armed with our magic hookup cases and their seemingly infinite capacity, we are equipped to take care of you. With a 100% hookup rating, we are the go to place :)
Our uniformed bike messengers have served our community with playawide delivery services for your missives, parcels, letters, schwag since 1999.

Snow Koan Solar provides solar-based power for burners who need to recharge anything from a camera battery to an art car.  We also serve chilly refreshments each afternoon when the sun is four fingers from the horizon.  Our motto:   Relax  Recharge  Rethink.  Consider stopping by.
When the sun starts to set our 8 foot tall tubes of dry-ice cooled sake are awakened by beats from NightJuice, our velvety, pulsating art car. Come dance and be refreshed by our ice cold sake.

Come get annoyed at obnoXious , the most irritating camp on the Playa. We will be serving up a late night cacophony of squawking techno and blasting annoyance through our stadium bullhorns. Climb our tower and grab the mic if you have something important for the city to hear. We know you all do.

Celestial Bodies is a straight-friendly camp hosting a large and comfortable lounge for shade, drinks, music and entertainment. Visit our Garden of Hedon art installation and dust off your 80_s attire (disco drag always encouraged) and/or your favorite underwear for a DevaLution disco extravaganza.

deBOCCEry is about friends, old and new, lazy days, sunrises and sunsets.  deBOCCEry will be a place to play a relaxing game of BOCCE during the heat of the day. Shade, hydration and a game with new friends.

American Steal: Dream Big!After years of bringing big art to the playa, we want to teach you how create your own outrageously huge art.View our flaming sculptures from atop our 15 ton crane, then participate in a welding class to learn how to make your own!

Offering a variety of services to make your kitty purrr. We aim to pamper and please with full body massages, shave and grooming services and other fun things to do. Bring your kitty on by the Pussy Hut and check our posted schedule of fun services. Meow.

Got some baggage (Fear of commitment? Close-minded? Bitterness over unrequited love?) you_d like to get rid of? Don_t carry that baggage around with you, leave it with us and we_ll take care of it.  Unclaimed baggage will be burned Sunday night at the temple burn. Emotional baggage only!

CRTT is coming home once again!  We provide 24-hour entertainment with themes changing daily and/or hourly. Join us for Candy or a Spanking, The Silence of the Lambs dance contest, Drunken pirate sing-along Sno-cone Day, make a mutant stuffed animal, or write a note on the Evodome.

Home Free Dome is an experimental community of encounter designed to accelerate and amplify the transformative cultural forces at play in Black Rock City. Come enter our technoshamanic machine for turning spectators into participants, veterans into virgins, and virgins into virtuosos.
the gathering of the sphere is a group of old and new burners alike, brought together on a quest to come together on our own small sphere within the context of the countless others that surround us.

Nipple Inspection and Placement Station. Coming tp BRC to further advancements in the science of nipple classification. How do your nipples stand up? Come by to have your nipples evaluated for type and class. Nipple coverings will be given as needed while supplies last.

Mail the default world or someone across the playa! Our skilled postal staff is ready to give the best in bureaucracy art! Come to 9 o'clock plaza for fun and adventure. Bring stamps! Share your postcards! The postal window is the frame that outlines some of the most unique performance art anywhere.

SunSets celebrates the rise of evening. We offer a fusion of music, art and words, both live and recorded, and offer our space as a place where people can fuse ideas or simply enjoy. We invite you to join us and create brilliantly memorable, strong and fun experiences to take back out into the world.

Make a difference by bringing the fierce creativity of Burning Man to your community the other 51 weeks of the year. Burners Without Borders is here to support you! Come and find out what your community has been up to this past year and how you can participate year-round.

A gentleman_s club providing space with stripper poles, a silhouette screen and plenty of lap dance space. Bring your favorite dancer with you or see who_s currently on a pole. Please, be respectful and enjoy this environment dedicated to the sexy side of dance.

Hailing from the DC area and beyond, we offer several activities for your delight: sock poi making workshops, beginning poi spinning classes, hoop-making, beginner hoop lessons, a performance by members of the Playa Del Fuego Fire Conclave and more! Also a BRC Post Office 2.0 auxiliary mail drop.
Home to the fabulous Yum Cart. Hospitality services by day and Rumi readingsby night.

Want It understands more than anything what it is to desire. We are a camp that celebrates wanting and the importance that desire places as a driving force in life. Push it further. Want it harder. Want It!

We are the Ezh camp. We are Ezhiki _ little hedgehogs. Come frolic with us in the forest of fun, chill with us in our norki and listen to our ezhik sounds. We will have fun games, a giant glowing Jenga, treats, and smiles and hugs for you.

Cliches are for the birds. The Boobs and the Bees, aka the Hive, is a fanciful take on evolution, devolution, and coevolution centered on sensuality, art, and fire.  Be abreast and swing by our pasty booth for all your chest adornment needs and assistance, especially before the bike parade.
Fickleodeon will be fully mobile this year, bringing its brand of mercurial theater to every darkened corner of Black Rock City. Back at home, we'll have shade. And drinkies!

All are welcome to come by and pimp out your cup with some bling! Enjoy our white trash lemonade, while being entertained by your fellow burners on our community stage. We have shade and couches to escape the heat of the day. We have All types of music playing. p.s. Fuck your couch!!! )'(
We are members of a open fire conclave in Los Angeles. We focus on sharing and promoting performance (fire or otherwise) throughout the community.
Everywhere land is a collection of friends from Canada, the U.S., Australia and Italy. Drop by and visit everywhere!

Silicon Village welcomes you.  Visit our plaza - our 10+ Pods offer things such as live open-mike music + bar (Hair of the Dog), Happy Hours, Merkin Fashion Show, Mist'R Mister misting booth, Semuta Lounge chill dome, Windsurfing Lessons, daytime massage tent, giant pool table and more!

Sacred Spaces Village comprises of mystics, artists, healers, and revolutionaries who are passionate about creating sacred spaces on and off the playa through visionary art, ceremony, teaching, and healing work.

Venture into the Time of Your Life time capsule . Learn from our past mistakes and greatnesses, peak into ideas of our future.  Evolve to be able to live in this moment, the time of your life.  Margarita bar, dj's, yoga, dancing, drumming, misting system, swamp cooler.  Chill by day, groove by night.

The Oakland-based industrial art group, bringing you crazy interactive sculptures, teaching you to make awesome stuff, and building large-scale fire art (through pyro wing Interpretive Arson) since 2005.
Cats get cosy in the womb. bring your own bowl!
column5: within evoLLLution: the Lively Loving Lot

column4: Whether you're a baby, a school kid or a full-grown rule-breaker, Adult Supervision is what you need!  Come party in the Bass Crib or take a licking at the Spanking Station; after school punch and diapers are available.
Burning Man meets Dia de los Muertos, Death is part of EVOLUTION, Experience time in a coffin and celebrate those who have gone before us, as we honor them.

Videogasm featuring independent / experimental video art on our 3 screens, nightly at Snowflake Village. Host of the BRC edition of the 48 Hour Film Project. Home of the renowned spray paint artists, The Spray Dogs. Come by and get tagger! Contact us if you have an original video you'd like to show at our Playa Theatre.
A bunch of silly people from all over the West decided to be silly together. We're happy, we're friendly, we like to smile and hang out.

Come frolic through the maze to our garden of highly evolved plants that glow at night.   Enjoy a short rest in our cool & shaded Zoom Dome.  Tuesday & Wednesday nights join us for the next evolution of baseball on fire.  Wednesday poi & staff lessons midday.

DE-EVOLVE and join the monkey business @ the Primate Playground. Chill on our astro-grass under a parachute shade tree and upload BM city and art maps to your GPS. Enjoy some Improv-Improv, playground games, monkey art, and even a trickling waterfall. What_s more fun than a barrel full of monkeys!

a Ginkgo Biloba Experience - GET SMART_er get back the memories of the things that you know you forgot! Our friendly bar is serving up CBGB tea!  Visit our Salon de Beaute & Inappropriate massage. Our stylists want to crown you with a custom, icy-cold, fashionable GB head-wrap! Say WOW NOW!

You think 10 days on the playa is hard? Trying wandering the desert for 40 years! Celebrate Judaism the burner way with strip dreidl, the Miss Shiksa Contest, performances by the Challah Back girls, and more irreverent fun for Jews, Semi-Semites, and the goys who love 'em.

Evolve into a Glamorous Being, adapted to feel good and look great on the Playa.  Our services, if you are lucky enough for them to be rendered, include massage, playa-hair, anti-chaffing powder, spray-downs and makeup.  Have a cocktail and beautify your playa evolution experience, Humboldt style...

"?Question Everything?"~Camp? is a community of many different people encouraging others to question. Use your questioning mind to help enhance critical thinking. Be more playful, & less passive. Through questions we will have a more intimate connection & understanding with things & each other.???

We're a Boston-based camp, bringing our best all the way to the playa. Come on over, have a drink, chill in our two-story dome, dance, take a class, enjoy, and let us prove to you that we may hail from the rude northeast, but we gots some love to give & smiles we've been waiting all year to release.

_Your Home Away from Home Away from Home__ The Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica sets the standard for hospitality in the Black Rock City Metropolitan Area. Enjoy a crisp cocktail and conversation. Our well-informed and obsequious concierge will be happy to advise the traveler of all the city offers.

Karma Chickens are all about sharing knowledge and experience!  We grill delicious meals and serve refreshing drinks in our 25-foot dome. We teach juggling, swing dancing, belly dancing, grey water management, conduct pillow fights, paint, play acoustic and amplified music and more!

Join us for morning tea and knitting classes, or come play 4-square, tetherball, double-dutch, and ladder golf at the Poisoned Playground.  After dark, belly up to the bar for a shot of liquid courage, then sing your pants off (literally) in the Palace's karaoke lounge!

STATESIDE DUBSTEP CAMPRedLine & various other crews from across america bring you the StateSide Dubstep Camp!5 nights of the best stateside dubstep djs america has to offer.Tons of surprises & sound provided by FSOUND!!!!

Wrangling the cosmos for well over a decade, the Space Cowboys are proud to provide the hitching post for the playa's finest dancers, discos, djs, dreamers, and sugar daddys. but please don't follow us, we're only following the Mog...

Got too much on your mind? All those facts and figures got you down? At the Black Rock Center for Unlearning you'll finally let go of the burdens of knowledge. Let our UNtrained professionals help you UNfigure out where you don't want to go and what you don't want to become.

column3: Space Monkey Mafia: The Theme Camp
column4: Space Monkey Mafia: The Theme Camp presents The Multi-Media Dome, The First Church of Mary Jane & Wedding Chapel, and The Lifeforce Speakeasy. Different types of events will be held throughout the day like playa weddings, a vampire bar, and fun music & videos from all genres and eras.

Floating through a field of glowing coral, you are drawn to the pulsing blue-green bioluminescence of the belly of the jellyfish. Climb up its tentacles, become enmeshed in its tangled digestive webs, and leave as a transgenic human, tagged with fluorescent genes of the jelly and the corals.
N/A

You like potatoes, I like potatoes. Come by for the potato cannon shooting gallery, potato events, a drink at the potato bar, or stuffing your face full of damn potatoes!  Burlap abounds.Also OK if you don't like potatoes. We're crazy like that.

Otter ReEvolution #9 is an oasis of love and conscious celebration.  This is the 15th year in a row in which we, the Otter Clan, bring our love, laughter and fancy pants dancing to Burning Man.  Viva La ReEvolution!

Red Lightning is ablaze with inspiration for humanity to transform our connections with Earth, Spirit and one other. Within our Sacred Sanctuary, we aspire to awaken consciousness and provide solutions for our collective evolution through art, education, workshops, performance, ritual & celebration.
Once again the Corral is "bringing it" to the playa.  The Corral is known for their camp hotties, and trust me they have alot up their sleeves for 2009.

Darwin_s Monkey Bar & Treetops Lounge, The Crystal Caverns 40 dome chill space, Cafe Kona_s coffee & chai, The Royal Barge, Evolution Island Bar, F-15 Interceptor, and over 150 gallons of finest homebrew & exotic beverages_join our Beervolution, entertaining friends new and old around the clock!
Bacchanal Carnival! A tantalizing feast of games and diversions for all who venture by!
Cosmic Giggle is a fun-oriented bunch of burners from San Francisco and beyond, seeking and recognizing all magical moments and elements to add to the serendipitous stew.

A space for social experimentation where the curious can explore their past, future or demise. New friends will determine their own path depending on their choice of other-wordly tonics and libations. The Time Machine will convey us to explore our evolutionary origins and destiny.

Sacred Dance to world class dance music.  Why sacred?  We hope you touch Spirit on the dance floor, to kiss eternity on the lips to help you have courage to fight injustice.  Or at least to make you horny and a better dancer.  Art made by the camp members for the community. And NO, we don't pay dj's.
MOIST returns participatory plaster casting to the playa! Visitors to our camp will be the molds by which this year's plaster effigy evolves.

Our Garden of Earthly Delights; sonorous music, friendly folk, some natural and unnatural fauna. All fluidly maintained by our white picket fence of love, use it to proudly display your photo moments of burn love; that glance you caught, that kiss you saw, or those dusty hands holding each other
Tiki Fuckos, your destination for debauchery, shenanigans and a few drunk Mexicans.

Drift into the Bubble Lounge and dip your wand into the nectar of the stars and watch its swirling iridescence evolve into a perfect sphere with the thickness of one molecule.   In the beginning, there was the bubble and it was good...

PLEASair is a _Sunset Happy Hour Bar_ dance club, operating from about 3pm to 8pm, Tuesday-Friday and 1pm-6pm on Saturday.Guests are treated to _Jet Fuel_ (Cactus Cooler soda and Tequila) and _Flight Crew Homebrew (beer) if aged 21 and over.  DJs spin music with ample dance area provided under our shade cloth _fuselage_ and _wings_ and outer areas.

Come learn to make fire by friction, cook a meal with our solar oven, or observe the lotus flower as it morphs each day toward something primitive.  Pyramid and matching golden arches welcome you into the shade for an adult or other cool beverage.

Promoting the COHESION of life forms everywhere. We present the return of the ever evolving REALLY GOOD BAR in it's third mutation. Come celebrate life with us and make some NOISE at the Black Rock TAP ATTACK!! Check us out after dark to interact with our glowscreen!
Extreme Frequencies presents Tundra Bunny, a playa transport unit for all your dream destinations. Nightmare destinations available on request. LAND! AIR! SEA! SPACE!

Hookahdome is your oasis in the desert -- a friendly dome featuring shisha, conversation, exotic music, belly dancing and other live performances, and of course the magic you create with friends old and new.

As the most advanced company on the planet, False Profit's most valuable asset is our brand.  By harnessing the full potential of our top secret american corporate technology, we will present an environment of delight that is guaranteed to throw the market into flux.

column3: El Circo and The Do Lab
column4: El Circo and The Do Lab Present: Simpler Times....

Come sit in the lap of luxury. The HiLux art car has now evolved into the ultimate advancement -- HiLuxury and has upgraded its digs to the ultra luxurious Camp HiLuxury. Come for the glam and stay for the upscale real estate, Black Rock Michelin rated drinks and treats, and shark tank.

Camp Save-the-Man leads the yearly futile effort to preserve the Man from his terrible fate.  You'll also find the panoramic wall of history with giant photos of BRCs past, the playa phone booth, Mandalas, saved ice, art cars and a nerdy group of fun folks.

Scientology, a truly new and modern religion for the 21st century, comes to Black Rock City to demonstrate techniques proven to help one overcome the problems of our every changing world. No matter the problem, something can be done about it.
BYB, Support Services, Hangout & Chill, Girl's Camp Annex
Come and grove to the custom tunes of DJ Makia here at Sin City. Enjoy a variety of mashes and techo tunes. Or just dance until you drop as we turn tunes into the night.

Home of Shai-Hulud the Sandworm Mutant Vehicle.Visit our Dune inspired camp. Play Mondo Croquet & be refreshed and entertained at the sTEAp Tea House. Bring your own cup!Wed, all evolving creatures are invited to join the Intergalactic Species Parade. Gather and garb at 5 pm. Parade leaves at 6 pm.

"The G-Spot" is a diverse group of Burning Man explorers that have built an amazing community through similar mind-set & participation, with our mantra being "If you can't find us, then you're not coming". Please come and enjoy our many pleasurable amenities, if you can find us!

We will be producing a daily newspaper for Black Rock City with a mixof fun articles and serious news. Our Press Club & News Room will provideshade and refreshment for ourselves as well as other members of the press andinterested burners.

On a mission to find a Beat so Perfect, all life in the Universe can feel the Vibe; an elite group of burners went into the desert to develop a top-secret project known as Quantum Beats. Join us on a musical journey through time and space in the hopes the next beat will lead humanity home..

The Space Virgins, Team Ubergeek and Camp in Bed have landed on the playa at Area 47!  The Space Virgins have also brought their ancient ones - the butterflies of Luminous Flux, with them to join the party.  Join us and our highly evolved ancestors as we play in Black Rock City.

A Chrysalis of colorful characters and like-minded souls cocoon & reach for the Next Phase in the evolution of Human Consciousness with a salon for skewering dead concepts, shattering the Ego, and igniting the Mind; enhanced with a Performance Platform for sharing and a Healing Lounge for massage.

A reality-defying Yoga camp. Please check calendar or drop by to see our schedule of daily classes--yoga and more! If you would like to teach a class in our space, please contact us to be added to the schedule.

A discordian space to get your Toon groove on. Silly music, twisted toon artworks, heavy metal kareeokee, dangerouse projections, furry breakdancing, costume play, with no shame, no pc and nothing sacred. Not for children.

Behold Circus Metropolus, an indie-circus collective comprised of Circus Metropolus, Gooferman, the EnHightened Beings of Leisure, The Sisters of Honk, and Fou Fou Ha!. Indulge daily in our interactive Klownge and our High Chair Stilt Bar for choice music and circus acts and general tomfoolery.

The YGL will be dedicated to providing a setting for those seeking a unique experience. Participants inhabiting this defined space will be persuaded to dress in underwear to nourish a common basis for a shared group experience. A stage with lighting, sound, and planed activities will be available.

Stuff breaks at Burning Man.  Come fix it at Pandora's Fit It Shoppe.  We will have available basic materials and tools for repairing bikes, costumes, Mohawk hair cuts, fire spinning gear or whatever.  Enjoy some liquor at the lounge while waiting for your friends to finish fixing their stuff.

We exist to give and receive fun. Come because you see the potential of fun in everything and feel anger at nothing. We are strong supporters of hot cocoa, birthday cakes, hats, champagne, carefree dancing and loud guffaws. Check out www.thefuncult.org for future information on surprise parties.
The Yurt Cafe will feature afternoon tea, shady refuge, and impromptu duststorm parties.

There is hope for Mankind. All things puffy, and yellow - a collective of artists and techies that enjoy visitors of all walks of life, camp camaraderie, music, communal cooking, drinking morning coffee and ice cold beer - enjoy an overabundance of all things puffy, and yellow.
Basscamp is back in 09 with even more heart pounding bass for your listening pleasure.  Keep your eye out for Ganesh balzin' through the night.

Soulicious is filled with laughter beauty gratitude decadence and abundance. Anyone is welcome off the dusty street for an impromptu blindfolded pillowfight/winetasting/hooping game of tickling or simply to dance. Stop by Friday for SOULBRUNCH when we offer the yummiest eats and filthiest beats.

The Planetarium's star speckled outer walls surround low seats inside to give the participant a view of the night sky, free of the light glare from Black Rock City. Additionally, "artificial" constellations, meteors, UFOs and other celestial events are superimposed over the real night sky in real time, constantly changing and filling the viewer with the awe of the Universe while providing some interesting celestial treats to make it fun and inspiring. Ever changing audio environments gently accompany the experience.

The RELOVUTION camp is a theme camp inspired by The Bastille, a symbol of despotism and freedom. But in this camp, the storming of The Basting is being done a little differently than back in 1789: it is done through love, art, sharing, and great music. Costumes and good vibes are a must...

We got whiskey...we got whores...what else do you f-ing need?! Saunter on in to spin our wheel of misfortune and give us a big yee-haw for a shot that'll rot your gut. Driving a MV? Pull in out front for Tillie's Service Station: Performing Services for Art Cars. Let us get you & your riders pumped!

SchweinKamp bows in adoration to all that is evolutionarily pink and porky - all that is bacon - and brings schweiny love to fellow burners. It's a space for interpersonal management refinement and self-help for those cursed with hangovers, physical and metaphysical.
Come Yak with the Yeti upon his plush, fluffy pad. Receive the wisdom, warmth, and fuzziness from our friend of the forests.

Your home for exotic cocktails, live music, and gourmet dining since 2003. Swing by for elegant libations served in real glassware, jam with our house band, work with our chefs to bring culinary wonder to the playa, store your wine in our refrigerated cellar, and visit the black rock vineyards!

Solve the mystery of Black Rock City's origins at the Deus Ex Detective Agency! Stop by to listen to the sad but intriguing cases of customers in need of a private eye, don your sleuthing garb, and then take off to follow clues (and a twisting plot) around the city.

Embracing the universal & ineluctable principle of EVOLUTION, our Bank has evolved into the First Transdimensional Bank+Church. FTB+C aims to elevate our philosophy of anti-commercialism & counter-profitability to the status of theological truth through the offering of numerous metafiscal services.
Bringing the potential for violence, quivering on the edge of the starry sky, since 1999.

Nexus brings it home once again. Drink specials all day, with the best beats on the playa to match. Laughs, friends and a booty shaking good time. lots shade, 3 domes, and 30,000 watts of earth shattering bass!

Breakaway Republic...Come take a break away from the fray and journey in to your own private evolving reality.  Write a letter or create a sketch or painting to mail on or off the playa to a friend or loved one, take home as a memento of your BM experience, or leave at the Temple to be burned.

Fusion Valley, home of the 3 headed cow... This year we'll have couches, Internet Cafe, music, movies, painting, games, video arcade games and other fun activities under our carpeted shade. Silk Screening will be available too this year! We also have black light art, with many paintings on display.

We are manifesting Green Shamballah as an Integrated, Activated and Organic society of spiritually centered beings, unified in Sacred Commerce and Collective Ritual as 1 people.  We feature Sustainable Technologies and Sacred Esoteric Teachings as the foundation for this esoteric society.
Jingleheimer invites you to join us in the celebration of dance & sound. Daily jam sessions open to all musicians, and nightly performances from live bands, visual artists, DJ's.

Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. Our theme camp will bring Dark Sparkle to the playa through a series of interactive workshops, performances, art projects and music events.

Restore your body and lift your spirits at Comfort & Joy, a queer community center offering daily events including yoga classes, discussion groups, skill building workshops and outrageous performances every night.

Our goal is to add color to peoples lives through their nails. We know howgrimey everyone's nails get out on the playa during Burning Man. We would liketo beautify hands throughout Black Rock City by offering nail painting. Wewill be open Tuesday through Friday from 5-7p (Sat 4-6p). DJ too!

column3: EE Camp: Magic Circus Band Camp
column4: Environmental Encroachment, Magic Circus Band, hosts a mobile theme camp: EE CAMP. EE creates parades and adorns mobile art, ceremony, and procession, appearing when and where by chance and when necessary, open to all HONK bands, wayward honk-a-teers, circussy types, and parade lovers.

Find your soulmate! Our staff of trained professionals provide comprehensive interviews to help you find the very best person on the playa to hang out with! Customers may enjoy complimentary drinks, random acts of spontaneous tomfoolery, and soul connections - all at warehouse prices!
